<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Name of each exchange on which registered</p></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:38%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000;"><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000020" name="dei:Security12bTitle" contextRef="C_0001731348_20220614_20220614"><p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Class 2 Common Stock, $0.0001 par<br />value per share</p></ix:nonNumeric></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="width:1%;">
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="width:15%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000;">
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000021" name="dei:TradingSymbol" contextRef="C_0001731348_20220614_20220614">TLRY</ix:nonNumeric></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="width:1%;">
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="width:45%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000;">
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000022" name="dei:SecurityExchangeName" contextRef="C_0001731348_20220614_20220614" format="ixt-sec:exchnameen">The Nasdaq Global Select Market LLC</ix:nonNumeric><br /></p></td>
</tr>
</table></div>
<p style="margin-top:9pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Indicate by check mark whether the registrant is an emerging growth company as defined in Rule 405 of the Securities Act of 1933 (&#167;&#8201;230.405 of this chapter) or Rule 12b-2 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (&#167;&#8201;240.12b-2 of this chapter).</p>
<p style="margin-top:9pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Emerging growth company&#160;<span style="font-family:Segoe UI Symbol;"><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000018" name="dei:EntityEmergingGrowthCompany" contextRef="C_0001731348_20220614_20220614" format="ixt-sec:boolballotbox">&#9744;</ix:nonNumeric></span></p>
<p style="margin-top:9pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act.&#160;<span style="font-family:Segoe UI Symbol;">&#9744;</span></p>
<p style="border-bottom:Double 2.25pt;padding-bottom:1pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" />
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:2pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Item 1.01 Entry into a Material Definitive Agreement.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">On June 14, 2022, Tilray Brands, Inc. (the &#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline;">Company</span>&#8221; or &#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline;">Tilray</span>&#8221;) entered into amendments to improve the terms of its previously-disclosed agreements to acquire from HT Investments MA LLC (&#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline;">HTI</span>&#8221;) all of the outstanding principal and accrued and unpaid interest under a secured convertible note (as amended and restated, the &#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline;">HEXO Note</span>&#8221;) issued by HEXO Corp. (&#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline;">HEXO</span>&#8221;). These amendments provide, among other things, for an additional discount to Tilray&#8217;s purchase price and that the conversion price of the HEXO Note be adjusted down from CAD$0.85 to CAD$0.40.&#160;&#160; </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Specifically, Tilray and HTI entered into an amended and restated assignment and assumption agreement dated as of June 14, 2022 (the &#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline;">Amended Assignment Agreement</span>&#8221;).&#160;&#160;Pursuant to the Amended Assignment Agreement,&#160;&#160;the purchase price for the HEXO Note will be equal to the outstanding principal balance of the HEXO Note as of the closing date (approximately $185 million as of the date hereof, and such amount at closing to be not less than $160 million) less a purchase price discount equal to 10.8% of the principal outstanding balance. The purchase price shall be payable by Tilray to HTI in the form of a newly-issued $50 million convertible note (the &#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline;">Tilray Convertible Note</span>&#8221;) and the balance, at Tilray&#8217;s option (subject to certain conditions and limitations), in cash consideration, Class 2 Common Stock of Tilray or any combination thereof.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Tilray Convertible Note will bear interest at a rate of 4.00% per annum calculated and paid on a quarterly basis. The Tilray Convertible Note will mature on September 1, 2023, unless earlier repurchased or converted.&#160;&#160;The Tilray Convertible Note obligations will be general unsecured obligations and rank subordinated in right of payment to all of Tilray&#8217;s current and future indebtedness to banks, commercial finance lenders or other lending institutions.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Tilray Convertible Note is convertible at HTI&#8217;s election in whole or in part at any time prior to 5:00 p.m. (New York) on the second trading day immediately preceding the maturity date into shares of Tilray&#8217;s Class 2 common stock, par value $0.0001 (the &#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline;">Common Stock</span>&#8221;), at a conversion rate equal to 125% of the closing price on the issuance date of the Tilray Convertible Note (the &#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline;">Conversion Price</span>&#8221;). The Conversion Price is subject to adjustment under certain circumstances in accordance with the terms of the Tilray Convertible Note.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">If Tilray undergoes a fundamental change (as defined in the Tilray Convertible Note), upon not less than 20 or more than 35 business days&#8217; notice Tilray shall offer to repurchase for cash all of the outstanding obligations under the Tilray Convertible Note at a fundamental change repurchase price equal to 105% of the outstanding obligations, unless HTI converts the Tilray Convertible Note in accordance with its terms.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">In connection with the Amended Assignment Agreement, each of Tilray, HEXO and HTI also entered into an amended transaction agreement dated as of June 14, 2022 (the &#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline;">Amending Agreement</span>&#8221;), pursuant to which (i) HEXO agreed to issue the amended HEXO Note to Tilray, (ii) the outside closing date for the transactions was extended to August 1, 2022, (iii) HEXO&#8217;s minimum liquidity covenant is reduced from $100 million to CAD$70 million, (iv) Tilray will have board governance rights to appoint two of HEXO&#8217;s board members and two observers and (v) the initial conversion price of the HEXO Note has been amended from CAD$0.85 to CAD$0.40.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">To the extent that the HEXO Note is acquired with Class 2 Common Stock of Tilray, the Amended Assignment Agreement provides for a post-closing adjustment, such that if the purchase price (less any amounts satisfied or to be satisfied in cash or the Tilray Convertible Note) divided by the daily volume weighted average price (the &#8220;<span style="text-decoration:underline;">VWAP Price</span>&#8221;) of the Class 2 Common Stock of Tilray for the 44-trading day period following closing is greater than the number of shares issued at closing, then Tilray shall deliver to HTI in cash or additional shares, at Tilray&#8217;s option (subject to certain conditions and limitations), an amount equal to such difference multiplied by the VWAP Price. </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The issuance of the Tilray Convertible Note and the maximum number of shares of Class 2 Common Stock of Tilray that may be issued to HTI under the Tilray Convertible Note and the Amended Assignment Agreement were registered with the U.S. Securities and Exchange &#8206;Commission under the Company&#8217;s &#8206;Registration Statement on Form S-3 (333-233703).</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Each of the transactions and agreements described above remain subject to several closing conditions, including receipt of HEXO shareholder approval&#59; applicable regulatory approvals&#59; and Tilray and HEXO having entered into commercial arrangements to achieve production efficiencies and cost-saving synergies.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Copies of the amendment documents are filed as Exhibits 10.1, 10.2 and 10.3 with this Current Report on Form 8-K and are incorporated herein by reference.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Item 8.01 Other Events. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">On June 14, 2022, the Company issued a press release announcing the amended terms of its agreement to acquire the HEXO Note. A copy of this press release is attached hereto as Exhibit 99.1 and incorporated herein by reference.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Item 9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:6pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(d) Exhibits. </p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" />
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>

<tr>
<td colspan="2" valign="top" style="padding-left:0.25pt;padding-Right:0.25pt;padding-Top:0.25pt;padding-Bottom:0.25pt;width:auto;white-space:nowrap;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;color:#000000;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">104</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="padding-left:0.25pt;padding-Right:0.25pt;padding-Top:0.25pt;padding-Bottom:0.25pt;width:auto;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="padding-left:0.25pt;padding-Right:0.25pt;padding-Top:0.25pt;padding-Bottom:0.25pt;width:auto;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Cover Page Interactive Data File (formatted in Inline XBRL document)</p></td>
</tr>
</table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><img src="g3ujbplrwapf000001.jpg" title="" alt="" style="width:624px;height:3px;" /></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><br /></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" />
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">SIGNATURES </p>
<p style="margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned thereunto duly authorized. </p>
<div style="align:left;">

<TEXT>
<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/loose.dtd">
<html>
<head>
<title>
tlry-ex101_6.htm
</title>
</head>
<!-- NG Converter v5.0.2.71 -->
<body>

<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">EXHIBIT 10.1</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><a name="DocsID"></a>AMENDING AGREEMENT TO TRANSACTION AGREEMENT</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">THIS AGREEMENT <font style="font-weight:normal;">is made as of June 14, 2022</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">AMONG:</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">TILRAY BRANDS, INC.<font style="font-weight:normal;">, a corporation existing under the laws of the State of Delaware;</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Tilray</font>&#8221;)</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">- and -</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">HEXO CORP.<font style="font-weight:normal;">, a company existing under the laws of the Province of Ontario;</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">HEXO</font>&#8221;);</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">- and - </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">HT INVESTMENTS MA LLC<font style="font-weight:normal;">, a limited liability corporation existing under the laws of the State of Delaware</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">HTI</font>&#8221; and collectively with Tilray and HEXO, the &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Parties</font>&#8221;).</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:4.76%;text-indent:-4.76%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;color:#000000;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">All capitalized terms used in this amending agreement (this &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Agreement</font>&#8221;) but not defined herein shall have the meaning attributed to such terms in the Transaction Agreement. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;color:#000000;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">RECITALS:</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:6.73%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#000000;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">A.</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;"></font>On April 11, 2022, Tilray, HEXO and HTI (collectively, the &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Parties</font>&#8221;) entered into a transaction agreement (the &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Transaction Agreement</font>&#8221;), pursuant to which, among other things, HEXO and HTI agreed to amend the terms of certain senior secured convertible notes of HEXO due May 1, 2023 (as amended, the &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Amended and Restated Note</font>&#8221;);</p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:6.73%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#000000;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">B.</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;"></font>On April 11, 2022, the Parties entered into an assignment and assumption agreement (the &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Assignment and Assumption Agreement</font>&#8221;), pursuant to which Tilray agreed to assume from HTI, and HTI agreed to assign, transfer and sell to Tilray all of its rights, title and interest under, the Amended and Restated Note; and&#8206; &#8206;</p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:6.73%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#000000;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">C.</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;"></font>The Parties wish to enter into this Agreement to amend certain provisions of the Transaction Agreement as contemplated herein. </p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;color:#000000;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Now therefore, for good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which is hereby acknowledged, the Parties hereby confirm, acknowledge and agree as follows:&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:6.73%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">1.</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Section 1.1(76) of the Transaction Agreement is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p> </p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#8220;&#8206;&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Outside Date</font>&#8221; means August 1, 2022; subject to the right of any Party to extend the &#8206;Outside Date in 30-&#8206;day &#8206;increments if the Regulatory Approvals have not been obtained &#8206;and have not been &#8206;denied &#8206;by a non-appealable decision of a Governmental Entity; &#8206;provided that &#8206;notwithstanding the foregoing, a Party shall not be permitted to extend the &#8206;Outside Date &#8206;if &#8206;the failure to obtain any of the Regulatory Approvals is primarily the &#8206;result &#8206;of such &#8206;Party&#8217;s wilful breach of this Agreement; and provided further that the &#8206;Outside Date shall not be extended past November 30, 2022&#8206;.&#8221; &#8206;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:6.73%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">2.</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Section 2.2 of the Transaction Agreement is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#8220;Immediately following the entry of the Seller and the Company into the Amended and Restated Note on the Closing Date, the Seller shall sell and assign to the Purchaser, and the Purchaser agrees to purchase immediately following the Closing Time, the Amended and Restated Note (the &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Purchased Note</font>&#8221;) pursuant to the assignment and assumption agreement entered into by the Purchaser, the Seller and the Company in the form attached hereto as Schedule C (the &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Assignment and Assumption Agreement</font>&#8221;), subject to the satisfaction of the conditions set forth in the Assignment and Assumption Agreement, which Purchased Note shall immediately following such Note Assignment have a total principal amount outstanding equal to the sum of (i) the Outstanding Principal as of the Closing Date immediately prior to such Note Assignment, <font style="font-style:italic;">plus </font>(ii) the accrued and unpaid interest as of the Closing Date immediately prior to such Note Assignment.&#8221;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:6.73%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">3.</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Section 2.3(1)&nbsp;&nbsp;of the Transaction Agreement is hereby amended by replacing &#8220;$0.54&#8221; with &#8220;CAD$0.40&#8221;. </font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:6.73%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">4.</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Section 4.1(3) of the Transaction Agreement is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#8220;<font style="text-decoration:underline;">Minimum Liquidity</font>. The Company shall maintain a cash balance in an amount equal to or greater than CAD$70,000,000 (after giving effect to a release of all conditions in any blocked accounts and restricted cash of the Company and its Subsidiaries and including net cash proceeds expected to be received from the Company&#8217;s captive D&amp;O insurance policy).&#8221; </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:6.73%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">5.</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Section 4.15(1) of the Transaction Agreement is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#8220;&#8206;The Company agrees to use its best efforts to obtain the Requisite Shareholder Approval, as soon as reasonably practicable and in any event by no later than July 15, 2022. The Company will (i) give notice of, and conduct, a meeting of shareholders of the Company (the &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Meeting</font>&#8221;) to obtain the Requisite Shareholder Approval and (ii) prepare and deliver an information circular, form of proxy and other documents required by applicable Canadian Securities Laws (collectively, the &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Proxy Statement</font>&#8221;) to such persons and in </p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">such forms, as required by the </font><font style="font-style:italic;">Business Corporations Act</font><font style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"> (Ontario), the by-laws of the Company and Securities Laws, as applicable</font><font style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#8206;;&#8206;&#8221;.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:6.73%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">6.</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Section 4.18(1) of the Transaction Agreement is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(1)<font style="margin-left:36pt;">At the Closing Time and thereafter for so long as the Purchased Note is outstanding or the Company is a &#8220;reporting issuer&#8221; within the meaning of Canadian Securities Laws or an issuer required to file reports under the 1934 Act:</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><a name="_Ref99321030"></a>&#8220;(a) <font style="margin-left:36pt;">the Board of Directors shall consist of nine (9) members (inclusive of any &#8206;Purchaser nominees contemplated in Section 4.18(1)(b)) with the majority of such &#8206;members being &#8220;independent&#8221; directors for purposes of applicable Securities &#8206;Laws; and</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(b) <font style="margin-left:36pt;">the Purchaser shall be entitled to nominate (and the Board of Directors will appoint and support re-election of such nominees) two (2) directors (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;">Purchaser Nominees</font>&#8221;) and shall have the right to one (1) observer (the &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Purchaser Observer</font>&#8221;) in respect of all Board of Director meetings, actions and activities.&#8221;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:6.73%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">7.</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Section 4.18(2) of the Transaction Agreement is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#8220;<font style="text-decoration:underline;">Purchaser Nominees</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(a)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">The Parties acknowledge that the initial Purchaser Nominees shall be Denise Faltischek and such other individual that the Purchaser may designate in its sole discretion, and that the Purchaser Nominees will be appointed to the Board of Directors immediately following the Closing.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref95820257"></a><a name="_Ref99321124"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(b)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">The Company shall, for so long as the Purchaser holds at least 1% of the Amended Note Securities held by the Purchaser upon consummation of the Note Assignment (on an as-converted to HEXO Shares basis), (i)&#160;recommend and reflect such recommendation in any management information circular relating to any meeting where directors of the Company are elected (or submit to shareholders by written consent, if applicable) that the Company Shareholders vote to elect the Purchaser Nominees to the Board of Directors for a term of office expiring at the closing of the subsequent annual meeting of the shareholders of the Company, and (ii)&#160;solicit proxies in favour of and otherwise support each Purchaser Nominee&#8217;s election, each in a manner no less favourable than the manner in which the Company supports its other nominees (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Company Nominees</font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8221;) for election to the Board of Directors. For any meeting of the Company Shareholders (or written consent in lieu of a meeting) for the election of members to the Board of Directors, the Company shall not nominate, in the aggregate, a number of nominees greater than nine (9), including, for greater certainty, the Purchaser Nominees. </font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;">(c)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">In the event that either Purchaser Nominee is not duly elected to the Board of Directors or &#8206;shall cease to serve as a director of the Company, whether due to such Purchaser &#8206;Nominee&#8217;s death, disability, resignation or removal (including failure to be elected &#8206;by the Company Shareholders or being required to resign in accordance with any &#8206;applicable majority voting policy), the Company shall cause the Board of Directors &#8206;to appoint a Purchaser Nominee designated by the Purchaser to fill the vacancy so created.&#8206;</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(d)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Each Purchaser Nominee shall be compensated for such Purchaser Nominee&#8217;s service on the &#8206;Board of Directors and any committee thereof consistent with the Company&#8217;s &#8206;policies for director compensation, provided that any employee of or party to a &#8206;consulting arrangement with the Company or any of its Affiliates who serves as &#8206;a Purchaser Nominee shall not be entitled to any salary or compensation from the &#8206;Company for such Purchaser Nominee&#8217;s services. The Purchaser Nominees shall be &#8206;reimbursed for all reasonable expenses related to their service on the Board of &#8206;Directors consistent with the Company&#8217;s policies for director reimbursement.&#8206;</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(e)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">The Purchaser acknowledges that it will not provide, directly or indirectly, the Purchaser Nominees with any compensation for the Purchaser Nominees&#8217; service on the Board of Directors or any committee thereof. </font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(f)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">It is acknowledged by the Purchaser that each Purchaser Nominee will, at the time of his or her nomination, and at all times while serving on the Board of Directors: (i) &#8206;comply with all policies of the Company that are applicable to members of the &#8206;Board of Directors; (ii) meet the qualification requirements to serve as a director under the </font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Business Corporations Act</font><font style="color:#000000;"> (Ontario) and the rules of any stock exchange on which the Shares are then listed (including executing and filing a Personal Information Form with the TSX and the applicable CSA regulator); (iii) acknowledge and agree to be bound by this Agreement with respect to the obligations of the Purchaser Nominee; and (iv) maintain the required security clearances under the </font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Cannabis Act</font><font style="color:#000000;"> (Canada) and the Cannabis Regulations, SOR/2018-144.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(g)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">The Company shall enter into an indemnification agreement with each Purchaser Nominee &#8206;in a form substantially similar to the Company&#8217;s form of director indemnification &#8206;agreement and shall indemnify and provide the Purchaser Nominees with director &#8206;and officer insurance to the same extent it indemnifies and provides insurance for &#8206;the other members of the Board of Directors pursuant to the constating documents &#8206;of the Company, applicable Laws or otherwise.&#8221; &#8206;</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:6.06%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">8.</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Section 6.3 (11) of the Transaction Agreement is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:3.85%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#8220;(11)<font style="margin-left:36pt;">The Company shall have a cash balance of not less than CAD$70,000,000 (after giving effect to a release of all conditions in any blocked accounts and restricted cash of the Company and its Subsidiaries and including net cash proceeds expected to be received from the Company&#8217;s captive D&amp;O insurance policy.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Purchaser shall have received a certificate, duly executed by the Chief Executive Officer or Chief Financial Officer of the Company, dated as of the Closing Date, to the foregoing effect in the form acceptable to the Purchaser.&#8221;</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:6.06%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">9.</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Schedule A of the Transaction Agreement is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced with the form of Amended and Restated Note attached to this Agreement as Schedule A.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.06%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Schedule C of the Transaction Agreement is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced with the Amended and Restated Assignment and Assumption Agreement attached to this Agreement as Schedule B. </font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.06%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">

<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:6.06%;white-space:nowrap">

<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Tilray hereby</font><font style="color:#1F497D;font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">irrevocably waives any right or entitlement that may arise in favour of Tilray as a result of any non-compliance by HEXO with Section 4.1(3) of the Transaction Agreement for all periods prior to the date of this Amending Agreement for all purposes, including any right or entitlement to Tilray pursuant to Section 6.3(14) and Section 7.2 (1)(e) of the Transaction Agreement as a result of any such non-compliance prior to the date of this Amending Agreement, without acknowledgement or admission by HEXO as to the existence of any such non-compliance.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<td valign="top" style="width:6.06%;white-space:nowrap">

<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Tilray agrees that HEXO shall be entitled to designate the insurance broker of its choice to establish D&amp;O insurance coverage in lieu of the coverage afforded by HEXO&#8217;s captive cell structure, and that HEXO shall be entitled to proceed with the winding-down of such captive cell structure and the transfer of captive funds to HEXO&#8217;s unrestricted cash accounts in the manner and subject to the timing determined by HEXO in its entire discretion.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Except for the amendments contemplated in this Agreement, no other amendments to the Transaction Agreement will be made by the parties pursuant to this Agreement, and the Transaction Agreement shall otherwise remain outstanding on identical terms and conditions.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">This Agreement may be executed in any number of counterparts (including counterparts by facsimile) and all such counterparts taken together shall be deemed to constitute one and the same instrument. The Parties shall be entitled to rely upon delivery of an executed facsimile or similar executed electronic copy of this Agreement, and such facsimile or similar executed electronic copy shall be legally effective to create a valid and binding agreement between the Parties. </font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-left:6.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">This Agreement will be governed by and interpreted and enforced in accordance with the laws &#8206;of the State of Delaware and the federal laws of the United States of America applicable &#8206;therein.&#8206; Each Party irrevocably attorns and submits to the exclusive jurisdiction of the D</font></p></td></tr></table></div>

<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">This Agreement becomes effective only when executed by each of the Parties. <td colspan="2" valign="top"  style=" border-bottom:solid 0.75pt #000000;">

<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Authorized Signing Officer </p></td>

</table></div>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><br /></p>
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-weight:bold;">SCHEDULE A</font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">FORM OF AMENDED AND RESTATED NOTE</p>
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"></p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-weight:bold;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"></font><font style="font-variant: small-caps;">HEXO Corp.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Amended and Restated Senior Secured Convertible Note due 2026</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Certificate No.<font style="margin-left:72pt;">A-1</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">HEXO Corp., an Ontario, Canada corporation (the &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Company</font>&#8221;), for value received, promises to pay to HT Investments MA LLC (the &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Initial Holder</font>&#8221;), or its permitted registered assigns, the principal sum of <font style="font-weight:bold;">[&#9632;] </font>million dollars ($<font style="font-weight:bold;">[&#9632;]) </font>(such principal sum, collectively with all Capitalized Interest and direct and indirect costs incurred by the Holder in connection with the acquisition of this Note) (the &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Principal Amount</font>&#8221; or the &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Maturity Principal Amount</font>&#8221;) on May 1, 2026, and to pay any outstanding interest thereon, as provided in this Note, in each case as provided in and subject to the other provisions of this Note, including the earlier redemption or conversion of this Note.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">This Note was originally issued pursuant to that certain Indenture, dated as of May 27, 2021 (the &#8206;&#8206;&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Indenture</font>&#8221;), between the Company and GLAS Trust Company LLC, as trustee, as &#8206;supplemented and modified by an action of the Board of Directors (as defined below) on May &#8206;&#8206;27, 2021 (the &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Board Resolution</font>&#8221;).&nbsp;&nbsp; The terms of this Note include those stated in the Indenture, as supplemented and modified by the Board Resolution.&nbsp;&nbsp;For the avoidance of doubt, any provisions herein that replace or amend any provision of the Indenture shall only apply to the extent of this Note, and any other provisions of the Indenture shall remain in full force and effect with respect to this Note and otherwise.&#8206;<font style="margin-left:36pt;"></font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">Additional provisions of this Note are set forth in the following pages to this Note entitled &#8220;HEXO Corp. &#8211; Senior Secured Convertible Note due 2026&#8221;, which form a part of this Note.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">[<font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;">The Remainder of This Page Intentionally Left Blank; Signature Page Follows</font>]</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"></p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;"><font style="font-weight:bold;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF</font>, HEXO Corp. has caused this instrument to be duly executed as of the date set forth below.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:46.15%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-variant: small-caps;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;">HEXO CORP.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:46.15%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>

</tr>

<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;"><font style="margin-left:36pt;"></font>&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><br /></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 2</a> -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-variant: small-caps;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;">HEXO Corp.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Senior Secured Convertible Note due 2026</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">This Note (this &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Note</font>&#8221; and, collectively with any Note issued in exchange therefor or in substitution thereof, the &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Notes</font>&#8221;) is issued by HEXO Corp., an Ontario, Canada corporation (the&#160;&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Company</font>&#8221;), and designated as its &#8220;Senior Secured Convertible Notes due 2026.&#8221;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">This Note is subject to the terms of the Indenture.&nbsp;&nbsp;Pursuant to the Board Resolution and Section 3.1 of the Indenture, notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this Note or the Indenture, to the extent that any provisions of this Note conflicts with any provisions of the Indenture, the provisions of this Note will control to the extent of such conflict. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:-15.38%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman Bold;font-variant: small-caps;font-size:12pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;">Definitions.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">Capitalized terms used but not defined herein shall have the meanings set forth in the Indenture to the extent defined therein.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Acceptance Notice</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in<font style="font-weight:bold;"> Section 16</font>.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Adjusted</font> <font style="font-weight:bold;">EBITDA</font>&#8221; means, for any fiscal quarter, the Adjusted EBITDA of the Company, calculated as: (i) total net income (loss); (ii) plus (minus) income taxes (recovery); (iii) plus (minus) finance expense (income); (iv) plus depreciation; (v) plus amortization; (vi) plus (minus) investment (gains) losses, including revaluation of financial instruments, share of loss from investment in joint ventures, adjustments on warrants and other financial derivatives, unrealized loss on investments, and foreign exchange gains and losses; (vii) plus (minus) fair value adjustments on inventory and biological assets; (viii) plus inventory write-downs and provisions; (ix) plus (minus) non-recurring transaction and restructuring costs; (x) plus impairments to any and all long-lived assets; (xi) plus all stock-based compensation; and (xii) plus any management or advisory fee paid by the Company to the Holder or any Affiliate thereof during the applicable quarter. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Affiliate</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in Rule 144 under the Securities Act.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">ATM Program</font>&#8221; means any at-the-market distribution program within the meaning of Part 9 of National Instrument 44-102&#8212;<font style="font-style:italic;">Shelf Distributions</font> (and the equivalent or corresponding concept under U.S. securities laws) that the Company may implement from time to time by way one or more agreements with sales agents with respect thereto and under one or more prospectus supplements filed under one or more base shelf prospectuses.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">ATM Shares</font>&#8221; means and all Common Shares issued from time to time by the Company pursuant to an ATM Program.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
