<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Authorized Denomination</font>&#8221; means, with respect to the Notes, a Principal Amount thereof equal to $1,000 or any integral multiple of $1,000 in excess thereof, or, if such Principal Amount then-outstanding is less than $1,000, then such outstanding Principal Amount.</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 3</a> -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Average DDT Volume</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in<font style="font-weight:bold;"> Section 8(F)(i)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;"><a name="_cp_text_1_1"></a><a name="_cp_text_1_2"></a><a name="_cp_text_1_3"></a>&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Bankruptcy Law</font><a name="_cp_text_1_1"></a>&#8221; means Title 11, United States Code, the <font style="font-style:italic;">Bankruptcy and Insolvency Act</font> (Canada), the <font style="font-style:italic;">Companies' Creditors Arrangement Act</font> (Canada) <a name="_cp_text_1_2"></a>or any similar U.S. federal or state, Canadian federal or provincial <a name="_cp_text_1_3"></a>or non-U.S. or non-Canadian law for the relief of debtors.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Board of Directors</font>&#8221; means the board of directors of the Company or a committee of such board duly authorized to act on behalf of such board.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Board Resolution</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in the cover page of this Note.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Business Combination Event</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in<font style="font-weight:bold;"> Section 10</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;"><a name="_cp_text_1_4"></a><a name="_cp_text_1_6"></a>&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Business Day</font><a name="_cp_text_1_4"></a>&#8221; means any day other than a Saturday, a Sunday or any day on which commercial banks in The City of New York or in Toronto, Ontario are authorized or required by law or executive order to close or be closed; <font style="font-style:italic;text-decoration:underline;">provided</font>, <font style="font-style:italic;text-decoration:underline;">however</font>, for clarification, commercial banks in The City of New York or in Toronto, Ontario<a name="_cp_text_1_6"></a> shall not be deemed to be authorized or required by law or executive order to close or be closed due to &#8220;stay at home&#8221;, &#8220;shelter-in-place&#8221;, &#8220;non-essential employee&#8221; or any other similar orders or restrictions or the closure of any physical branch locations at the direction of any governmental authority so long as the electronic funds transfer systems (including for wire transfers) of commercial banks in The City of New York or Toronto, Ontario are open for use by customers on such day.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;"><a name="_cp_text_1_7"></a>&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Canadian Securities Laws</font>&#8221; means securities laws and the applicable rules and regulations under such laws, together with applicable published national, multilateral and local policy statements, instruments, notices and blanket orders of the CSA in each of the provinces and territories of Canada.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Capital Lease</font>&#8221; means, with respect to any Person, any leasing or similar arrangement conveying the right to use any property, whether real or personal property, or a combination thereof, by that Person as lessee that, in conformity with IFRS, is required to be accounted for as a capital lease on the balance sheet of such Person.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Capital Lease Obligation</font>&#8221; means, at the time any determination is to be made, the amount of the liability in respect of a Capital Lease that would at that time be required to be capitalized on a balance sheet prepared in accordance with IFRS, and the stated maturity thereof shall be the date of the last payment of rent or any other amount due under such lease prior to the first date upon which such lease may be prepaid by the lessee without payment of a penalty.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Capital Stock</font>&#8221; of any Person means any and all shares of, interests in, rights to purchase, warrants or options for, participations in, or other equivalents of, in each case however designated, the equity of such Person, but excluding any debt securities convertible into such equity.</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 4</a> -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Capitalized Interest</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in Section 4.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Cash</font>&#8221; means all cash and liquid funds.<font style="margin-left:36pt;"></font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;"><a name="_cp_text_1_8"></a><a name="_cp_text_1_9"></a><a name="_cp_text_1_10"></a><a name="_cp_text_1_11"></a><a name="_cp_text_1_12"></a><a name="_cp_text_1_13"></a><a name="_cp_text_1_14"></a>&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Cash Equivalents&#8221;</font><a name="_cp_text_1_8"></a> means, as of any date of determination, any of the following: (A) marketable securities (i) issued or directly and unconditionally guaranteed as to interest and principal by the United States Government or the Government of Canada<a name="_cp_text_1_9"></a>, or (ii) issued by any agency of the United States or Canada <a name="_cp_text_1_10"></a>the obligations of which are backed by the full faith and credit of the United States or Canada, respectively<a name="_cp_text_1_11"></a>, in each case maturing within one (1) year after such date; (B) marketable direct obligations issued by any state of the United States of America or Province of Canada or <a name="_cp_text_1_12"></a>any political subdivision of any such state or Province or <a name="_cp_text_1_13"></a>any public instrumentality thereof, in each case maturing within one (1) year after such date and having, at the time of the acquisition thereof, a rating of at least A-1 from Standard &amp; Poor&#8217;s Corporation or at least P-1 from Moody&#8217;s Investors Service; (C) commercial paper maturing no more than one (1) year from the date of creation thereof and having, at the time of the acquisition thereof, a rating of at least A-1 from Standard &amp; Poor&#8217;s Corporation or at least P-1 from Moody&#8217;s Investors Service; (D) certificates of deposit or bankers&#8217; acceptances maturing within one (1) year after such date and issued or accepted by any commercial bank organized under the laws of the United States of America or Canada or <a name="_cp_text_1_14"></a>any State, Province or Territory thereof or the District of Columbia that (i) is at least &#8220;adequately capitalized&#8221; (as defined in the regulations of its primary federal banking regulator), and (ii) has Tier 1 capital (as defined in such regulations) of not less than $5,000,000,000; and (E) shares of any money market mutual fund that (i) has substantially all of its assets invested continuously in the types of investments referred to in clauses (A) and (B) above, (ii) has net assets of not less than $5,000,000,000, and (iii) has the highest rating obtainable from either Standard &amp; Poor&#8217;s Corporation or Moody&#8217;s Investors Service.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8206;&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Change of Control</font>&#8221; means: (a) any event as a result of or following which any person or entity &#8206;or group thereof &#8220;acting jointly or in concert&#8221; within the meaning of Canadian Securities Laws, &#8206;other than the Holder or any Affiliates thereof, whether independently or acting jointly or in &#8206;concert, and other than any Person(s) acting jointly or in concert with the Holder or any Affiliate &#8206;thereof, acquires beneficial ownership or control or direction over an aggregate of more than fifty &#8206;percent (50%) of the then outstanding votes attached to the shares of the Company, other than &#8206;pursuant to any exercise of rights of the Holders provided for in Section 8; or (b) the sale or transfer &#8206;of all or substantially all of the consolidated assets of the Company.&#8206;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Close of Business</font>&#8221; means 5:00 p.m., Toronto time.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Collateral</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in the Security Agreement. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Collateral Agent</font>&#8221; means, at any given time, the Holder (or such other Person appointed by the Holder, in such Person&#8217;s capacity as collateral agent for the Trustee, the Holder and each Other Holder, together with any successor thereto in such capacity.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Commission</font>&#8221; means the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 5</a> -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Common Share Equivalents</font>&#8221; means this Note and any options, restricted stock units or other security or obligation that is by its terms, directly or indirectly, convertible into, exchangeable or exercisable for Common Shares, and any option, warrant or other right to subscribe for, purchase or acquire Common Shares or any security convertible into Common Shares (disregarding any restrictions or limitations on the exercise of such rights).</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Common Shares</font>&#8221; means the common shares of the Company without nominal or par value, subject to any adjustment in accordance with the provisions of <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(J)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Common Shares Change Event</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(J)(i)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Contingent Obligation</font>&#8221; means, as applied to any Person, any direct or indirect liability, contingent or otherwise, of that Person with respect to (A) any Indebtedness or other obligations of another Person, including any such obligation directly or indirectly guaranteed, endorsed, co-made or discounted or sold with recourse by that Person, or in respect of which that Person is otherwise directly or indirectly liable; (B) any obligations with respect to undrawn letters of credit, corporate credit cards or merchant services issued for the account of that Person; and (C) all obligations arising under any interest rate, currency or commodity swap agreement, interest rate cap agreement, interest rate collar agreement, or other agreement or arrangement designated to protect a Person against fluctuation in interest rates, currency exchange rates or commodity prices; provided, however, that the term &#8220;Contingent Obligation&#8221; shall not include endorsements for collection or deposit in the ordinary course of business. The amount of any Contingent Obligation shall be deemed to be an amount equal to the stated or determined amount of the primary obligation in respect of which such Contingent Obligation is made or, if not stated or determinable, the maximum reasonably anticipated liability in respect thereof as determined by such Person in good faith; provided, however, that such amount shall not in any event exceed the maximum amount of the obligations under the guarantee or other support arrangement<font style="margin-left:36pt;"></font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Conversion Consideration</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(D)(i)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Conversion Consideration Interest Shares</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(D)(i)(2)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Conversion Consideration Interest Shares Notice</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(D)(ii)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Conversion Consideration Shortfall Payment</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(D)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Conversion Consideration Shortfall Payment Date</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(D)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Conversion Date</font>&#8221; means, with respect to a Note, the first Business Day on which the requirements set forth in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(C)(i)</font> to convert such Note are satisfied.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 6</a> -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Conversion Price</font>&#8221; means, as of any time, an amount equal to (A) one thousand dollars ($1,000) divided by (B) the &#8206;Conversion Rate in effect at such time.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Conversion Rate</font>&#8221; initially means the number of Common Shares equal to US1,000 divided by the USD equivalent of CAD$0.40 as determined the day before execution<font style="font-weight:bold;"> </font>per $1,000 Principal Amount of Notes; <font style="font-style:italic;">provided</font>, <font style="font-style:italic;">however</font>, that the Conversion Rate is subject to adjustment pursuant to <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8</font>; <font style="font-style:italic;">provided</font>, <font style="font-style:italic;">further</font>, that whenever this Note refers to the Conversion Rate as of a particular date without setting forth a particular time on such date, such reference will be deemed to be to the Conversion Rate immediately after the Close of Business on such date. For the avoidance of doubt, conversion calculations are to be calculated by the Holder and not the Trustee. The Company shall be the initial conversion agent and not the Trustee. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Conversion Settlement Date</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(D)(v)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Copyright License&#8221;</font> means any written agreement granting any right to use any Copyright or Copyright registration, now owned or hereafter acquired by the Company or in which the Company now holds or hereafter acquires any interest.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;"><a name="_cp_text_1_15"></a><a name="_cp_text_1_16"></a><font style="font-weight:bold;">&#8220;Copyrights&#8221;</font><a name="_cp_text_1_15"></a> means all copyrights, whether registered or unregistered, held pursuant to the laws of the United States, Canada, <a name="_cp_text_1_16"></a>any State, Province or Territory thereof or of any other country.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Covering Price</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(D)(vi)(1)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><a name="_cp_text_1_18"></a>&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">CSA</font>&#8221; means, collectively, the securities commission or other securities regulatory authorities in each of the provinces and territories of Canada. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Currency Due</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in<font style="font-weight:bold;"> Section 17</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Daily VWAP</font>&#8221; means, for any VWAP Trading Day, the per share volume-weighted average price of the Common Shares on the Nasdaq Capital Market as displayed under the heading &#8220;Bloomberg VWAP&#8221; on Bloomberg page &#8220;HEXO US &lt;EQUITY&gt; VAP&#8221; (or, if such page is not available, its equivalent successor page) in respect of the period from the scheduled open of trading until the scheduled close of trading of the primary trading session on such VWAP Trading Day (or, if such volume-weighted average price is unavailable, the market value of one share of Common Shares on such VWAP Trading Day, determined, using a volume-weighted average price method, by a nationally recognized independent investment banking firm selected by the Company).&nbsp;&nbsp;The Daily VWAP will be determined without regard to after-hours trading or any other trading outside of the regular trading session.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Default</font>&#8221; means any Event of Default and any event that is (or, after notice, passage of time or both, would be) an Event of Default.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Default Interest</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 4(A)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 7</a> -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Defaulted Amount</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 4(A)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Defaulted Shares</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(D)(vi)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Designated ELOC</font>&#8221; means that certain equity line of credit program providing for the issuance by the Company from time to time of Common Shares pursuant to an equity purchase agreement between the Company and 2692106 Ontario Inc. in a form satisfactory to the Holder. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Designated ELOC Common Shares</font>&#8221; means any and all Common Shares issued from time to time by the Company under the Designated ELOC.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Disclosure Letter</font>&#8221; means the disclosure letter delivered to the Purchaser concurrently with the execution of this Agreement.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Disqualified Stock</font>&#8221; means, with respect to any Person, any Capital Stock that by its terms (or by the terms of any security into which it is convertible or for which it is exchangeable at the option of the holder) or upon the happening of any event:</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">(A)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;matures or is mandatorily redeemable pursuant to a sinking fund obligation or otherwise;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">(B)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;is convertible or exchangeable for Indebtedness or Disqualified Stock (excluding Capital Stock convertible or exchangeable solely at the option of the Company or a Subsidiary of the Company; provided that any such conversion or exchange will be deemed an incurrence of Indebtedness or Disqualified Stock, as applicable); or</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">(C)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;is redeemable at the option of the holder thereof, in whole or in part,</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">in the case of each of clauses (A), (B) and (C), at any point prior to the one hundred eighty-first (181st) day after the Maturity Date.<font style="margin-left:36pt;"></font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#8206;<font style="margin-left:36pt;">&#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;">Distributed</font> <font style="font-weight:bold;">Securities</font>&#8221; means any securities distributed or issued pursuant to a Distribution.&#8206;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8206;&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Distribution</font>&#8221; means any distribution or issuance by the Company of: (i) equity securities in the capital of the Company, (ii) rights, options or warrants to purchase equity securities in the capital of the Company, (iii) securities of any type that are, or may become, convertible or exchangeable into or exercisable for equity securities in the capital of the Company, (iv) debt securities of the Company; <font style="font-style:italic;">provided that</font>, &#8220;Distribution&#8221; shall not include Excluded Issuances.&#8206;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">DTC</font>&#8221; means The Depository Trust Company.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Eligible Exchange</font>&#8221; means any of The New York Stock Exchange, The NYSE American, The Nasdaq Capital Market, The Nasdaq Global Market or The Nasdaq Global Select Market (or any of their respective successors).</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 8</a> -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;"><a name="_cp_text_1_19"></a>&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Equipment</font>&#8221; means all &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">equipment</font><a name="_cp_text_1_19"></a>&#8221; as defined in the UCC or the PPSA, as the case may be, with such additions to such term as may hereafter be made, and includes without limitation all machinery, fixtures, goods, vehicles (including motor vehicles and trailers), and any interest in any of the foregoing.<font style="margin-left:36pt;"></font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8206;&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Equity Conditions</font>&#8221; will be deemed to be satisfied as of any date if all of the following &#8206;conditions are satisfied as of such date and on each of the twenty (20) previous Trading Days: &#8206;&#8206;(A) the shares issuable upon conversion of this Note are Freely Tradable; (B) the Holder is not in &#8206;possession of any material non-public information provided by or on behalf of the Company; (C) &#8206;the Company is in compliance with <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(E)(i)</font> and such shares will satisfy <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(E)(ii)</font>; &#8206;&#8206;(D) no public announcement of a pending, proposed or intended Fundamental Change has &#8206;occurred that has not been abandoned, terminated or consummated; (E) the Daily VWAP per &#8206;Common Share on The Nasdaq Capital Market is not less than three hundred and fifty percent (350%) of the &#8206;Conversion Price (subject to proportionate adjustments for events of the type set forth in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section &#8206;&#8206;8(G)(i)(1))</font>; (F) the daily dollar trading volume (as reported on Bloomberg) of the Common &#8206;Shares on The Nasdaq Capital Market is not less than ten million dollars ($10,000,000); and (G) &#8206;no Default or Event of Default will have occurred or be continuing.&#8206;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Equity Interests</font>&#8221; shall mean, with respect to any Person, any and all shares, interests, participations or other equivalents, including preferred stock or membership interests (however designated, whether voting or non-voting), of equity of such Person, including, if such Person is a partnership, partnership interests (whether general or limited) and including, without limitation, any &#8220;equity security&#8221; (as that term is defined under Rule&#160;405 promulgated under the Securities Act), and any other interest or participation that confers on a Person the right to receive a share of the profits and losses of, or distributions of assets of, such partnership.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Equity Rights</font>&#8221; shall mean, with respect to any Person, any then-outstanding subscriptions, options, warrants, commitments, preemptive rights, convertible debt, or other equity-linked securities or agreements of any kind for the issuance or sale, of any additional Equity Interests of any class, or partnership or other ownership interests of any type in, such Person.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">ERISA&#8221;</font> means the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, as amended, and the regulations promulgated thereunder.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Event of Default</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 11(A).</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Event of Default Acceleration Amount</font>&#8221; means, with respect to the delivery of a notice pursuant to <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 11(B)(ii)</font> declaring this Note to be due and payable immediately on account of an Event of Default, a cash amount equal to the greater of: (A) one hundred fifteen percent (115%) of the then outstanding Principal Amount of this Note plus accrued and unpaid interest, if any; and (B) one hundred fifteen percent (115%) of the product of (i) the Conversion Rate in effect as of the Trading Day immediately preceding the date such notice is so delivered, (ii) the total then outstanding Principal Amount (expressed in thousands) of this Note plus accrued and unpaid interest, if any, and (iii) the greater of (x) the highest Daily VWAP per Common Share occurring </p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 9</a> -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">during the thirty (30) consecutive VWAP Trading Days ending on, and including, the VWAP Trading Day immediately before the date such notice is so delivered and (y) the highest Daily VWAP per Common Share occurring during the thirty (30) consecutive VWAP Trading Days ending on, and including, the VWAP Trading Day immediately before the date the applicable Event of Default occurred. </font><font style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">For the avoidance of doubt, any Event of Default Acceleration Amount will be calculated by the Holder and not the Trustee.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Event of Default Additional Shares</font>&#8221; means, with respect to the conversion of this Note (or any portion of this Note), an amount equal to the excess, if any, of (A) the Event of Default Conversion Rate applicable to such conversion over (B) the Conversion Rate that would otherwise apply to such conversion without giving effect to <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(I)</font>.&nbsp;&nbsp;For the avoidance of doubt, the Event of Default Additional Shares cannot be a negative number.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Event of Default Conversion Period</font>&#8221; means, with respect to an Event of Default, the period beginning on, and including, the date such Event of Default occurs.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;"><font style="font-weight:bold;">&#8220;Event of Default Conversion Price&#8221; </font>means, with respect to the conversion of this Note (or any portion of this Note), the lesser of: (A) the Conversion Price that would be in effect immediately after the Close of Business on the Conversion Date for such conversion, without giving effect to Section 8(I); and (B) seventy five percent (75%) of the lowest Daily VWAP per Common Share during the ten (10) consecutive VWAP Trading Days ending on, and including, such Conversion Date (or, if such Conversion Date is not a VWAP Trading Day, the immediately preceding VWAP Trading Day).</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Event of Default Conversion Rate</font>&#8221; means, with respect to the conversion of this Note (or any portion of this Note), an amount (rounded to the nearest 1/10,000th of a Common Share (with 5/100,000ths rounded upward)) equal to (A) one thousand dollars ($1,000) <font style="font-style:italic;">divided by</font> (B) the Event of Default Conversion Price applicable to such conversion.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Event of Default Notice</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 11(C)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Ex-Dividend Date</font>&#8221; means, with respect to an issuance, dividend or distribution on the Common Shares, the first date on which Common Shares trade on the applicable exchange or in the applicable market, regular way, without the right to receive such issuance, dividend or distribution (including pursuant to due bills or similar arrangements required by the relevant stock exchange).&nbsp;&nbsp;For the avoidance of doubt, any alternative trading convention on the applicable exchange or market in respect of the Common Shares under a separate ticker symbol or CUSIP number will not be considered &#8220;regular way&#8221; for this purpose.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Exchange Act</font>&#8221; means the U.S. Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Excluded</font> <font style="font-weight:bold;">Issuances</font>&#8221; means (i) the distribution or issuance by the Company of equity securities of the Company upon exercise, conversion, exchange or vesting of options, restricted stock units or other convertible securities pursuant to equity-based compensation plans that have been previously-approved by the Company&#8217;s shareholders, in accordance with the terms of such </p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 10</a> -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">plans, and (ii) the distribution or issuance by the Company of Designated ELOC Common Shares and/or ATM Shares.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Expiration Date</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(G)(i)(5)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Expiration Time</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(G)(i)(5)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Floor Price</font>&#8221; means any price which the TSX has indicated in writing that the Market Stock Payment Price may not be lower than.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Forced Conversion</font>&#8221; means the conversion of this Note pursuant to <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(F)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Forced Conversion Additional Payment</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 5(D)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Forced Conversion Additional Payment Date</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 5(D)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Forced Conversion Notice</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(F)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Forced Conversion Qualification Period</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(F)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;"><a name="_cp_text_1_20"></a>&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Freely Tradable</font><a name="_cp_text_1_20"></a>&#8221; means, with respect to any Common Shares issued or issuable under this Note (whether upon conversion of this Note or otherwise), that (A) such shares would be eligible to be offered, sold or otherwise transferred by the Holder pursuant to Rule 144, without any requirements as to volume, manner of sale, availability of current public information (whether or not then satisfied) or notice under the Securities Act and without any requirement for registration under any state securities or &#8220;blue sky&#8221; laws; or (B) such shares are (or, when issued, will be) (i) represented by book-entries at DTC and identified therein by an &#8220;unrestricted&#8221; CUSIP number; (ii) not represented by any certificate that bears a legend referring to transfer restrictions under the Securities Act, Canadian Securities Laws or other securities laws; and (iii) listed and admitted for trading, without suspension or material limitation on trading, on an Eligible Exchange and the TSX; and (C) no delisting or suspension by such Eligible Exchange or the TSX has been threatened (with a reasonable prospect of delisting occurring after giving effect to all applicable notice, appeal, compliance and hearing periods) or reasonably likely to occur or pending as evidenced by (x) a writing by such Eligible Exchange or the TSX or (y) the Company falling below the minimum listing maintenance requirements of such Eligible Exchange or the TSX.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Fundamental Change</font>&#8221; means any of the following events:</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><a name="_cp_text_1_21"></a>(A)<font style="margin-left:36pt;"><a name="_cp_text_1_21"></a>a &#8220;person&#8221; or &#8220;group&#8221; (within the meaning of Section 13(d)(3) of the Exchange Act), other than (x) the Company or its Wholly Owned Subsidiaries, (y) the employee benefit plans of the Company or its Wholly Owned Subsidiaries, or (z) the Holder or any of its Affiliates (including any &#8220;group&#8221; including the Holder or any of its Affiliates), files any report with the Commission </font>or the CSA indicating that such person or group has become the direct or indirect &#8220;beneficial owner&#8221; (as defined below) of shares of the Company&#8217;s common equity representing </p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 11 -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">more than fifty percent (50%) of the voting power of all of the Company&#8217;s then-outstanding common equity;</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(B)<font style="margin-left:36pt;">the consummation of (i) any sale, lease or other transfer, in one transaction or a series of transactions, of all or substantially all of the assets of the Company and its Subsidiaries, taken as a whole, to any Person (other than solely to one or more of the Company&#8217;s Wholly Owned Subsidiaries); or (ii) any transaction or series of related transactions in connection with which (whether by means of merger, consolidation, share exchange, combination, reclassification, recapitalization, acquisition, liquidation or otherwise) all of the Common Shares are exchanged for, converted into, acquired for, or constitutes solely the right to receive, other securities, cash or other property (other than a subdivision or combination, or solely a change in par value, of the Common Shares); </font><font style="font-style:italic;">provided</font>, <font style="font-style:italic;">however</font>, that any merger, consolidation, share exchange or combination of the Company pursuant to which the Persons that directly or indirectly &#8220;beneficially owned&#8221; (as defined below) all classes of the Company&#8217;s common equity immediately before such transaction directly or indirectly &#8220;beneficially own,&#8221; immediately after such transaction, more than fifty percent (50%) of all classes of common equity of the surviving, continuing or acquiring company or other transferee, as applicable, or the parent thereof, in substantially the same proportions vis-&#224;-vis each other as immediately before such transaction will be deemed not to be a Fundamental Change pursuant to this <font style="font-weight:bold;">clause (B)</font>;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(C)<font style="margin-left:36pt;">the Company&#8217;s stockholders approve any plan or proposal for the liquidation or dissolution of the Company; or</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(D)<font style="margin-left:36pt;">the Common Shares cease to be listed on any Eligible Exchange or the TSX.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">For the purposes of this definition, (x) any transaction or event described in both <font style="font-weight:bold;">clause (A)</font> and in <font style="font-weight:bold;">clause (B)(i)</font> or <font style="font-weight:bold;">(ii)</font> above (without regard to the proviso in <font style="font-weight:bold;">clause (B)</font>) will be deemed to occur solely pursuant to <font style="font-weight:bold;">clause (B)</font> above (subject to such proviso); (y) if any transaction or event described in <font style="font-weight:bold;">clause (B)(i)</font> or <font style="font-weight:bold;">(ii)</font> above (without regard to the proviso in <font style="font-weight:bold;">clause (B)</font>) occurs, after which the Company remains in existence but has no remaining assets or liabilities, the subsequent approval by the Company&#8217;s stockholders of any plan or proposal for the liquidation or dissolution of the Company shall not constitute a separate Fundamental Change; and (z) whether a Person is a &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">beneficial owner</font>&#8221; and whether shares are &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">beneficially owned</font>&#8221; will be determined in accordance with Rule 13d-3 under the Exchange Act.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Fundamental Change Redemption Date</font>&#8221; means the date designated by the Holder for redemption of this Note in connection with a Fundamental Change, as provided in<font style="font-weight:bold;"> Section 7(F)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Fundamental Change Base Repurchase Price</font>&#8221; means, with respect to this Note (or any portion of this Note to be repurchased) upon a Repurchase Upon Fundamental Change, a cash amount equal to the greater of: (A) one hundred five percent (105%) of the then outstanding Principal Amount of such Note (or portion thereof) to be so repurchased, plus any accrued and unpaid interest on this Note; and (B) one hundred five percent (105%) of the product of (i) the Conversion Rate in effect as of the Trading Day immediately preceding the effective date of such Fundamental Change, (ii) the Principal Amount of this Note to be repurchased upon a Repurchase </p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 12</a> -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Upon Fundamental Change divided by $1,000, and (iii) the Fundamental Change Stock Price for such Fundamental Change. For the avoidance of doubt, any Fundamental Change Base Repurchase Price calculations are to be calculated by the </font><font style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Holder </font><font style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">and not &#8206;the Trustee. &#8206;</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Fundamental Change Notice</font>&#8221; has the meaning set forth in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 7(C)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Fundamental Change Repurchase Date</font>&#8221; means the date as of which this Note must be repurchased for cash in connection with a Fundamental Change, as provided in <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 7(B)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Fundamental Change Repurchase Price</font>&#8221; means the cash price payable by the Company to repurchase this Note (or any portion of this Note) upon its Repurchase Upon Fundamental Change, calculated pursuant to <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 7(D)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Fundamental Change Stock Price</font>&#8221; means, with respect to any Fundamental Change, the highest Daily VWAP per Common Share occurring during the thirty (30) consecutive VWAP Trading Days ending on, and including, the day immediately before the effective date of such Fundamental Change. </p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">Holder</font>&#8221; means the person in whose name this Note is registered on the books of the Company, which initially is the Initial Holder.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">&#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">IFRS</font>&#8221; means International Financial Reporting Standards as issued by the International Accounting Standards Board, as in effect from time to time.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;text-indent:7.69%;">The term &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;">including</font>&#8221; means &#8220;including without limitation,&#8221; unless the context provides otherwise.</p>
