<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><a name="_Ref427753819"></a><a name="_Ref439784474"></a><a name="_Ref98774241"></a>Interest<font style="font-style:normal;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;Interest shall accrue on the Principal Amount from the date hereof, as well as on all overdue amounts outstanding in respect of interest, costs or other &#8206;fees, expenses or amounts payable hereunder, at the fixed rate of five percent (5%) per annum, &#8206;calculated daily, and be payable by the Company to the Holder semi-annually on the last Business Day of each June and December (commencing June, 2022) (each, an &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;">Interest Payment Date</font><font style="font-style:normal;">&#8221;), as well as on maturity, default and judgment.&#8206;&nbsp;&nbsp;During the period commencing on the date hereof and ending one year thereafter, the Company shall pay such interest in cash.&nbsp;&nbsp;Thereafter, until the Maturity Date, in the event that the Company is not in compliance with Section 9(M) as of any Interest Payment Date, the Company shall be entitled to elect to add the amount of the interest to the Principal Amount on each such Interest Payment Date (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;">Capitalized Interest</font><font style="font-style:normal;">&#8221;).&nbsp;&nbsp;Unless the Principal Amount and the Capitalized Interest have previously been converted pursuant to Section 8, on the Maturity Date, the Company shall pay the Capitalized Interest by way of Conversion Consideration in accordance with Section 8.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Maturity Date Payment<font style="font-style:normal;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;On the Maturity Date, the Company will pay the Holder an amount in cash equal to the Repayment Price for all of then-outstanding Principal Amount of this Note plus any accrued and unpaid interest on this Note.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Defaulted Amounts<font style="font-style:normal;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;If (i) the Company fails to pay any amount payable on this Note on or before the due date therefor as provided in this Note, then, regardless of whether such failure constitutes an Event of Default, or (ii) a Default or Event of Default occurs (such amount payable or the Principal Amount outstanding as of such failure to pay or Default or Event of Default, as applicable, a &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;">Defaulted Amount</font><font style="font-style:normal;">&#8221;) then in each case, to the extent lawful, interest (&#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;">Default Interest</font><font style="font-style:normal;">&#8221;) will accrue on such Defaulted Amount at a rate per annum equal to eighteen percent (18.0%), from, and including, such due date or the date of such Default or Event of Default, as applicable, to, but excluding, the date such failure to pay or Default is cured and all outstanding Default Interest under this Note has been paid, as applicable. Default Interest hereunder will be payable in arrears on the earlier of (i) the first day of each calendar month and (ii) the date such failure to pay or Default is cured, and will be computed on the basis of a 360-day year comprised of twelve 30-day months. For the avoidance of doubt, any such calculations are to be calculated by the Holder and not &#8206;the Trustee.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Payment to the Holder<font style="font-style:normal;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any funds to be delivered for payment to the Holder or any other third party shall be delivered by 10:00 a.m., Toronto time, on the relevant Redemption Date or any other Payment Date.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Note Provisions Control<font style="font-style:normal;">. For the avoidance of doubt, to the extent of any conflicts or inconsistencies, this Section 4 will apply to the Note in lieu of Section 3.7 of the Indenture, and such Section 3.7 of the Indenture will be deemed to be replaced with this Section 4 to the extent of such conflict or inconsistency, </font>mutatis mutandis<font style="font-style:normal;">, and any provisions of Section 3.7 of the </font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 24</a> -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:normal;">Indenture not specifically addressed or amended by this Section 4 shall continue to apply and control</font><font style="font-style:normal;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:-15.38%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman Bold;font-variant: small-caps;font-size:12pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;"><a name="_Ref427845134"></a><a name="_Ref427868575"></a>Redemption of <font style="font-family:Times New Roman;">this</font><font style="font-family:Calibri;"> </font>Note; Other Additional Payments.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(A)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Redemption Payments</font><font style="color:#000000;">. Except with the prior written consent of the Holder (in its sole discretion) or pursuant to paragraph (C) of this Section 5, the Company shall not be entitled to redeem all or any portion of this Note.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref70765641"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(B)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Forced Conversion Additional Payment</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event that a Forced Conversion occurs pursuant to </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 8(F)</font><font style="color:#000000;"> and the Daily VWAP per share of the Common Shares is less than three hundred fifty three percent (353%) of the Conversion Price for any five (5) VWAP Trading Days during the Forced Conversion Qualification Period, the Company shall, upon the Conversion Settlement Date for such conversion (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Forced Conversion Additional Payment Date</font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8221;), pay to the Holder an amount in cash equal to five percent (5%) of the Principal Amount outstanding immediately prior to such Forced Conversion (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Forced Conversion Additional Payment</font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8221;). &#8206; For the avoidance of doubt, any calculation of the Forced Conversion Additional Payment is to be calculated by the Holder and not &#8206;&#8206;the Trustee. </font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref98778723"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(C)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8206;The Company shall ensure that, if at any time after the date hereof, the Company or any Subsidiary of the Company (a) sells or &#8206;otherwise disposes of any assets in one or more transactions (other than as part of a Permitted &#8206;Asset Disposition) or (b) receives any insurance proceeds, the Company will promptly deliver written &#8206;notice to the Holder and, if requested by the Lender in its sole discretion, shall pay or cause to be &#8206;paid to the Lender (i) an amount equal to the proceeds of such sale, net of reasonable out-of-&#8206;pocket selling costs required to be paid by the Company to any third party in connection with &#8206;such sale or other disposal or (ii) such insurance proceeds (as the case may be), to be applied in &#8206;repayment of the outstanding balance of the Principal Amount. </font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(D)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Note Provisions Control</font><font style="color:#000000;">. For the avoidance of doubt, to the extent of any conflicts or inconsistencies, this Section 5 will apply to the Note in lieu of Article 10 of the Indenture, and such Article 10 of the Indenture will be deemed to be replaced with this Section 5 to the extent of such conflicts or inconsistencies, </font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">mutatis mutandis</font><font style="color:#000000;">, and any provisions of Article 10 of the Indenture not specifically addressed or amended by this Section 5 shall continue to apply and control.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:-15.38%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman Bold;font-variant: small-caps;font-size:12pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;"><a name="_Ref23066195"></a>Method of Payment; When Payment Date is Not a Business Day.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref439779044"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(A)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Method of Payment</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company will pay all cash amounts due under this Note by wire transfer of immediately available funds to the account or accounts specified by the Holder by written notice at least one (1) Business Day in advance of the date such amount is due.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(B)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Delay of Payment when Payment Date is Not a Business Day</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the due date for a payment on this Note as provided in this Note is not a Business Day, then, notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this Note, such payment may be made on the immediately following Business Day and no interest will accrue on such payment as a result of the related delay.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_cp_blt_1_32"></a><a name="_cp_text_1_33"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(C)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Canadian Interest Act</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;For the purposes of the </font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Interest Act </font><font style="color:#000000;">(Canada) and disclosure thereunder, whenever any interest or any fee to be paid hereunder or in connection herewith is to be calculated on the basis of a 360-day or 365-day year, the yearly rate of interest to which the rate used in such calculation is equivalent is the rate so used multiplied by the actual number of days </font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 25 -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="color:#000000;">in the calendar year in which the same is to be ascertained and divided by 360 or 365, as applicable.&nbsp;&nbsp;The rates of interest under this Note are nominal rates, and not effective rates or yields.&nbsp;&nbsp;The principle of deemed reinvestment of interest does not apply to any interest calculation under this Note.&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_cp_blt_1_34"></a><a name="_cp_text_1_35"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(D)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Canadian Criminal Interest</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;If any provision of this Note would oblige the Corporation to make any payment of interest or other amount payable to the Holder in an amount or calculated at a rate which would be prohibited by law or would result in a receipt by the Holder of &#8220;interest&#8221; at a &#8220;criminal rate&#8221; (as such terms are construed under the </font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Criminal Code </font><font style="color:#000000;">(Canada)), then, notwithstanding such provision, such amount or rate shall be deemed to have been adjusted with retroactive effect to the maximum amount or rate of interest, as the case may be, as would not be so prohibited by applicable law or so result in a receipt by the Holder of &#8220;interest&#8221; at a &#8220;criminal rate&#8221;, such adjustment to be effected, to the extent necessary (but only to the extent necessary), first by reducing the amount or rate of interest and thereafter by reducing any fees, commissions, costs, expenses, premiums and other amounts required to be paid which would constitute interest for purposes of section&#160;347 of the </font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Criminal Code </font><font style="color:#000000;">(Canada).</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(E)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Note Provisions Control</font><font style="color:#000000;">. For the avoidance of doubt, to the extent of any conflicts or inconsistencies, this Section 6 will apply to the Note in lieu of Sections 3.7, 3.8, 9.1 and 9.5 of the Indenture, and such Sections 3.7, 3.8, 9.1 and 9.5 of the Indenture will be deemed to be replaced with this Section 6 to the extent of such conflict or inconsistency, </font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">mutatis mutandis</font><font style="color:#000000;">, and any provisions of Sections 3.7, 3.8, 9.1 and 9.5 of the Indenture not specifically addressed or amended by this Section 6 shall continue to apply and control.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:-15.38%;font-weight:bold;font-variant: small-caps;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;"><a name="_Ref427872662"></a>Required Repurchase of Note upon a Fundamental Change<font style="font-family:Times New Roman Bold;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref428179411"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(A)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Repurchase Upon Fundamental Change</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the other terms of this </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 7</font><font style="color:#000000;">, if a Fundamental Change occurs, then the Holder will have the right to require the Company to repurchase this Note (or any portion of this Note in an Authorized Denomination) on the Fundamental Change Repurchase Date for such Fundamental Change for a cash purchase price equal to the Fundamental Change Repurchase Price.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref16873075"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(B)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Fundamental Change Repurchase Date</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Fundamental Change Repurchase Date for any Fundamental Change will be a Business Day of the Holder&#8217;s choosing that is no more than twenty (20) Business Days after the later of (x) the date the Company delivers to the Holder the related Fundamental Change Notice pursuant to </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 7(C)</font><font style="color:#000000;">; and (y) the effective date of such Fundamental Change. </font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref428176312"></a><a name="_Ref428177013"></a><a name="_Ref14261465"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(C)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Fundamental Change Notice</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;No later than the fifth (5th) Business Day before the occurrence of any Fundamental Change, the Company will send to the Holder (with a copy to the Trustee, which may be delivered via email) a written notice thereof (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Fundamental Change Notice</font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8221;), stating the expected date such Fundamental Change will occur.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref16860582"></a><a name="_Ref428175817"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(D)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Fundamental Change Repurchase Price</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Fundamental Change Repurchase Price for this Note (or any portion of this Note to be repurchased) upon a Repurchase Upon Fundamental Change following a Fundamental Change is an amount in cash equal to the Fundamental Change Base Repurchase Price for such Fundamental Change plus accrued and unpaid interest, if any, on this Note (or such portion of this Note) to, but excluding, the Fundamental Change Repurchase Date for such Fundamental Change.&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref428283283"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(E)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Effect of Repurchase</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;If this Note (or any portion of this Note) is to be repurchased upon a Repurchase Upon Fundamental Change, then, from and after the date the related </font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 26 -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="color:#000000;">Fundamental Change Repurchase Price is paid in full, this Note (or such portion) will cease to be outstanding and Default Interest, if any, will cease to accrue on this Note (or such portion). For the avoidance of doubt, any calculation of a Fundamental Change Repurchase Price will be calculated by the </font><font style="color:#000000;">Holder and not the Trustee</font><font style="color:#000000;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref23182954"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(F)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Fundamental Change Redemption</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding anything in this </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 7 </font><font style="color:#000000;">to the contrary, at the Holder&#8217;s sole discretion following receipt of a Fundamental Change Notice, in lieu of receiving the Fundamental Change Repurchase Price (or any portion thereof), the Holder may, upon written notice to the Company (which may be delivered via email), require the Company to redeem this Note (or any portion of this Note in an Authorized Denomination) in exchange for a number of validly issued, fully paid and Freely Tradable Common Shares equal to the quotient (rounded up to the closest whole number) obtained by dividing the Fundamental Change Repurchase Price (or applicable portion thereof) by the Market Stock Payment Price. The Fundamental Change Redemption Date for any Fundamental Change will be a Business Day of the Holder&#8217;s choosing that is no more than twenty (20) Business Days after the later of (x) the date the Company delivers to the Holder the related Fundamental Change Notice pursuant to </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 7(C)</font><font style="color:#000000;">; and (y) the effective date of such Fundamental Change.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any such Common Shares will be delivered by the Company to the Holder on or before the second (2nd) Business Day following a Fundamental Change Redemption Date.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding the foregoing, in the event that the Market Stock Payment Price is lower than the Floor Price on such Fundamental Change Redemption Date, (i) the Floor Price rather than the Market Stock Payment Price shall be used for purpose of calculating the number of Common Shares to be issued on such date pursuant to this </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 7(F)</font><font style="color:#000000;"> and (ii) the Company shall concurrently with the issuance of such shares also pay to the Holder an amount, in cash, equal to the product of (x) the number of shares by which the Common Shares issuable pursuant to this </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 7(F)</font><font style="color:#000000;"> was reduced as a result of the preceding clause (i), multiplied by (y) the Market Stock Payment Price.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(G)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Note Provisions Control</font><font style="color:#000000;">. For the avoidance of doubt, to the extent of any conflicts or inconsistencies, this Section 7 will apply to the Note in lieu of Article 12 of the Indenture, and such Article 12 of the Indenture will be deemed to be replaced with this Section 7 to the extent of such conflict or inconsistency, </font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">mutatis mutandis</font><font style="color:#000000;">, and any provisions of Article 12 of the Indenture not specifically addressed or amended by this Section 7 shall continue to apply and control.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:-15.38%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman Bold;font-variant: small-caps;font-size:12pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;"><a name="_Ref437686779"></a><a name="_Ref439796899"></a><a name="_Ref98773592"></a>Conversion, Pre-Emptive Rights and Top-Up Rights. </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref16873787"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(A)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Right to Convert</font><font style="color:#000000;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref16873779"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(i)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Generally.</font><font style="color:#000000;">&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the provisions of this </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 8</font><font style="color:#000000;">, the Holder may, at its option, convert this Note into Conversion Consideration.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(ii)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Conversions in Part</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the terms of this </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 8</font><font style="color:#000000;">, this Note may be converted in part, but only in an Authorized Denomination.&nbsp;&nbsp;Provisions of this </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 8</font><font style="color:#000000;"> applying to the conversion of this Note in whole will equally apply to conversions of any permitted portion of this Note.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(iii)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">The Trustee</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Trustee shall have no liability or responsibility for any conversion in connection with this Note or the actions or inactions of any party in connection with the conversion of this Note.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref427780991"></a><a name="_Ref437686994"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(B)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">When this Note May Be Converted</font><font style="color:#000000;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(i)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Generally</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Holder may convert this Note at any time until the Close of Business on the second (2nd) Scheduled Trading Day immediately before the Maturity </font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 27</a> -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="color:#000000;">Date.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref460315577"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(ii)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Limitations and Closed Periods</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 8</font><font style="color:#000000;">, if this Note (or any portion of this Note) is to be repurchased upon a Repurchase Upon Fundamental Change pursuant to </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 7</font><font style="color:#000000;">, then in no event may this Note (or such portion) be converted after the Close of Business on the Scheduled Trading Day immediately before the related Fundamental Change Repurchase Date; </font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">provided</font><font style="color:#000000;">, that the limitations contained in this </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 8(B)(ii)</font><font style="color:#000000;"> shall no longer apply to this Note (or such applicable portion) if the applicable Fundamental Change Repurchase Price is not delivered on the Fundamental Change Repurchase Date in accordance with Section 6.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref16864042"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(C)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Conversion Procedures</font><font style="color:#000000;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref17286398"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(i)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Generally</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;To convert this Note, the Holder must (1) complete, manually sign and deliver to the Company, with a copy to the Trustee (which may be delivered via email), the conversion notice attached to this Note or a portable document format (.pdf) version of such conversion notice (at which time such conversion will become irrevocable); and (2) pay any amounts due pursuant to </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 8(C)(iii)</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;For the avoidance of doubt, the conversion notice may be delivered by e-mail in accordance with </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 14</font><font style="color:#000000;">. If the Company fails to deliver, by the related Conversion Settlement Date, any Common Shares forming part of the Conversion Consideration of the conversion of this Note, the Holder, by notice to the Company, may rescind all or any portion of the corresponding conversion notice at any time until such Defaulted Shares are delivered.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref16871147"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(ii)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Holder of Record of Conversion Shares</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;The person in whose name any Common Shares are issuable upon conversion of this Note will be deemed to become the holder of record of such shares as of the Close of Business on the Conversion Date for such conversion, conferring, as of such time, upon such person, without limitation, all voting and other rights appurtenant to such shares.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref437687336"></a><a name="_Ref437881189"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(iii)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Taxes and Duties.</font><font style="color:#000000;">&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Holder converts a Note, the Company will pay any documentary, stamp or similar issue or transfer tax or duty due on the issue of any Common Shares upon such conversion; </font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">provided</font><font style="color:#000000;">, </font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">however</font><font style="color:#000000;">, that if any tax or duty is due because such Holder requested such shares to be issued in a name other than that of such Holder, then such Holder will pay such tax or duty and, until having received a sum sufficient to pay such tax or duty, the Company may refuse to deliver any such shares to be issued in a name other than that of such Holder.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref439786800"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(D)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Settlement upon Conversion</font><font style="color:#000000;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref437880846"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(i)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Generally</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;The consideration (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Conversion Consideration</font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8221;) due in respect of each $1,000 Principal Amount of this Note to be converted will consist of the following:</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(1)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">subject to </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 8(D)(iii)</font><font style="color:#000000;">, a number of Common Shares equal to the Conversion Rate in effect on the Conversion Date for such conversion; and</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref44327177"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(2)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">cash in an amount equal to the aggregate accrued and unpaid interest, if any, on this Note to, but excluding, the Conversion Settlement Date for such conversion or, at the election of the Company, a number of validly issued, fully paid and Freely Tradable Common Shares equal to the quotient (rounded up to the closest whole number) obtained by dividing the aggregate accrued and unpaid interest, if any, on this Note to, but excluding, the Conversion Settlement Date by the Market Stock Payment Price (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Conversion Consideration Interest Shares</font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8221;).&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 28 -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref427827829"></a><a name="_Ref16864053"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(ii)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Company&#8217;s Election to Convert Accrued Interest into Common Shares</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;At least ten (10) Trading Days prior to a Conversion Date, the Company, if it desires to elect to convert accrued and unpaid interest on this Note into Conversion Consideration Interest Shares pursuant to </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 8(D)(i)(2)</font><font style="color:#000000;">, shall deliver to the Holder, with a copy to the Trustee (which may be delivered via email), a written notice of such election and certifying that the Equity Conditions are satisfied as of such date (a &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Conversion Consideration Interest Shares Notice</font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8221;) (and such election shall be irrevocable with respect to such interest and all subsequent conversions until the Company provides to the Holder at least ten (10) Trading Days written notice of its intent to terminate such election).&nbsp;&nbsp;Failure to timely deliver such written notice to the Holder shall be deemed an election by the Company to pay such accrued and unpaid interest, if any, in cash.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding anything herein to the contrary, the Company will not have the right to, and will not, make any conversion of accrued interest, if any, into Conversion Consideration Interest Shares if the Equity Conditions are not satisfied for each VWAP Trading Day occurring between the day of the delivery of the Conversion Consideration Interest Shares Notice and the applicable Conversion Settlement Date (and the Company shall certify in writing to the Holder on the applicable Conversion Settlement Date that the Equity Conditions have been satisfied during such period), and such conversion of accrued interest, if any, shall instead be paid in cash in accordance with </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 8(D)(i)(2)</font><font style="color:#000000;">, unless such failure of the Equity Conditions to be so satisfied is waived in writing by the Holder, which waiver may be granted or withheld by the Holder in its sole discretion.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(iii)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Fractional Shares</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;The total number of Common Shares due in respect of any conversion of this Note will be determined on the basis of the total Principal Amount of this Note to be converted with the same Conversion Date; </font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">provided</font><font style="color:#000000;">, </font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">however</font><font style="color:#000000;">, that if such number of Common Shares is not a whole number, then such number will be rounded up to the nearest whole number.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(iv)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Delivery of the Conversion Consideration</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company will pay or deliver, as applicable, the Conversion Consideration due upon the conversion of this Note to the Holder on or before the second (2nd) Business Day (or, if earlier, (x) the standard settlement period for the primary Eligible Exchange on which the Common Shares are traded or (y) the standard settlement period for the TSX) immediately after the Conversion Date for such conversion (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Conversion Settlement Date</font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8221;).</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(v)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Effect of Conversion</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;If this Note is converted in full, then, from and after the date the Conversion Consideration therefor is issued or delivered in settlement of such conversion, this Note will cease to be outstanding and Default Interest, if any, will cease to accrue on this Note and notice thereof (which may be delivered via email) shall be provided to the Trustee by the Holder.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref17293243"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(vi)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Conversion Settlement Defaults</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;If (x) the Company fails to deliver, by the related Conversion Settlement Date, any Common Shares (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Defaulted Shares</font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8221;) forming part of the Conversion Consideration of the conversion of this Note; and (y) the Holder (whether directly or indirectly, including by any broker acting on the Holder&#8217;s behalf or acting with respect to such Defaulted Shares) purchases any Common Shares (whether in the open market or otherwise) to cover any such Defaulted Shares (whether to satisfy any settlement obligations with respect thereto of the Holder or otherwise), then, without limiting the Holder&#8217;s right to pursue any other remedy available to it (whether </font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 29 -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="color:#000000;">hereunder, under applicable law or otherwise), the Holder will have the right, exercisable by notice to the Company, to cause the Company to either:</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref17292947"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(1)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">pay, on or before the second (2nd) Business Day after the date such notice is delivered, cash to the Holder in an amount equal to the aggregate purchase price (including any brokerage commissions and other out-of-pocket costs) incurred to purchase such shares (such aggregate purchase price, the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Covering Price</font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8221;); or</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref17292950"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(2)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">promptly deliver, to the Holder, such Defaulted Shares in accordance with this Note, together with cash in an amount equal to the excess, if any, of the Covering Price over the product of (x) the number of such Defaulted Shares; and (y) the Daily VWAP per Common Share on the Conversion Date relating to such conversion.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">To exercise such right, the Holder must deliver notice of such exercise to the Company, specifying whether the Holder has elected <font style="font-weight:bold;">clause (1)</font> or <font style="font-weight:bold;">(2)</font> above to apply.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Holder has elected <font style="font-weight:bold;">clause (1)</font> to apply, then the Company&#8217;s obligation to deliver the Defaulted Shares in accordance with this Note will be deemed to have been satisfied and discharged to the extent the Company has paid the Covering Price in accordance with <font style="font-weight:bold;">clause (1)</font>.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref440377099"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(E)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Reserve and Status of Common Shares Issued upon Conversion</font><font style="color:#000000;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref17286428"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(i)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Stock Reserve</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;At all times when this Note is outstanding, the Company will reserve, out of its authorized but unissued and unreserved Common Shares, a number of Common Shares equal to the greater of (A) (x) the then outstanding Principal Amount, divided by (y) the Conversion Price then in effect and (B) two hundred percent (200%) of a fraction, the numerator of which shall be (x) the then outstanding Principal Amount plus an amount equal to all interest accruable on such outstanding Principal Amount through May 1, 2023, and the denominator of which shall be (y) the Market Stock Payment Price, for issuance upon the issuance of the Conversion Shares.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref440377114"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(ii)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Status of Conversion Shares; Listing</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;Each share of Common Shares delivered upon conversion of this Note will be a newly issued or treasury share and will be duly and validly issued, fully paid, non-assessable, free from preemptive rights and free of any Lien or adverse claim (except to the extent of any Lien or adverse claim created by the action or inaction of the Holder or the Person to whom such share will be delivered).&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Common Shares are then listed on any securities exchange, or quoted on any inter-dealer quotation system, then the Company will cause each share of Common Shares issued upon conversion of this Note, when delivered upon such conversion, to be admitted for listing on such exchange or quotation on such system.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref17131651"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(i)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Transferability of Conversion Shares</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any Common Shares issued upon conversion of this Note will be issued in the form of book-entries at the facilities of DTC, identified therein by an &#8220;unrestricted&#8221; CUSIP number.&nbsp;&nbsp;</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref16867483"></a><a name="_Ref416981561"></a><a name="_Ref416985112"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(F)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Forced Conversion</font><font style="color:#000000;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref16873851"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(i)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Generally</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;If (1) the Daily VWAP per Common Share is equal to, or exceeds, US$3.00&nbsp;&nbsp;(as proportionately decreased or increased to reflect any adjustment to the Conversion Rate contemplated in this Note) on each of twenty (20) consecutive VWAP Trading Days beginning after the Issue Date (such twenty (20) consecutive VWAP Trading Day period being the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Forced Conversion Qualification Period</font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8221;); and (2) the Equity Conditions are satisfied on each of such twenty (20) consecutive VWAP Trading Days, then, subject to the limitations on conversion contained in </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 8(K)</font><font style="color:#000000;">, the Company may </font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 30 -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="color:#000000;">provide written notice to the Holder electing to convert all or a portion of the Principal Amount of this Note on the Conversion Date into Conversion Consideration and certifying that the Equity Conditions have been satisfied on each of such VWAP Trading Days (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Forced Conversion Notice</font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8221;); </font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">provided</font><font style="color:#000000;"> that no Forced Conversion will be effected unless (x) the Daily VWAP per Common Share is equal to, or exceeds, US$3.00 (as proportionately decreased or increased to reflect any adjustment to the Conversion Rate contemplated in this Note) </font><font style="color:#000000;">and (y) the Equity Conditions are satisfied, in the case of each of clauses (x) and (y), </font><font style="color:#000000;">on each VWAP Trading Day from the date of such notice until the corresponding Conversion Consideration is delivered (and the Company shall certify in writing to the Holder on the date that such Conversion Consideration is delivered that the Equity Conditions have been satisfied during such period); and provided further, that the Company may deliver no more than one Forced Conversion Notice in any thirty (30) Trading Day period. </font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(ii)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Effect of Forced Conversion</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;A Forced Conversion will have the same effect as a conversion of the applicable outstanding Principal Amount of this Note effected at the Holder&#8217;s election pursuant to </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 8(A)</font><font style="color:#000000;"> with a Conversion Date occurring on the Business Day referred to in </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 8(F)(i)</font><font style="color:#000000;"> (for the avoidance of doubt, without the need for the Holder to deliver a conversion notice); </font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">provided</font><font style="color:#000000;">, </font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">however</font><font style="color:#000000;">, that the Company will not be obligated to deliver the Conversion Consideration until the Holder has complied, if applicable, with its obligations under </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 8(C)(iii)</font><font style="color:#000000;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(G)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Adjustments to the Conversion Rate</font><font style="color:#000000;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref16868401"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(i)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Events Requiring an Adjustment to the Conversion Rate</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the prior approval of the TSX, the Conversion Rate will be adjusted from time to time as follows:</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref417033128"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(1)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Stock Dividends, Splits and Combinations</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Company issues solely Common Shares as a dividend or distribution on all or substantially all shares of the Common Shares, or if the Company effects a stock split or a stock combination of the Common Shares (in each case excluding an issuance solely pursuant to a Common Shares Change Event, as to which </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 8(J)</font><font style="color:#000000;"> will apply), then the Conversion Rate will be adjusted based on the following formula:</font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><img src="g5ojowbhnc3e000001.jpg" title="" alt="" style="width:116px;height:47px;"></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">where:</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">CR</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">0</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the Conversion Rate in effect immediately before the Open of Business on the Ex-Dividend Date for such dividend or distribution, or immediately before the Open of Business on the effective date of such stock split or stock combination, as applicable;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
