<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">CR</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">1</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the Conversion Rate in effect immediately after the Open of Business on such Ex-Dividend Date or the Open of Business on such effective date, as applicable;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 31</a> -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">OS</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">0</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the number of Common Shares outstanding immediately before the Open of Business on such Ex-Dividend Date or effective date, as applicable, without giving effect to such dividend, distribution, stock split or stock combination; and</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">OS</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">1</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the number of Common Shares outstanding immediately after giving effect to such dividend, distribution, stock split or stock combination.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">If any dividend, distribution, stock split or stock combination of the type described in this <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(G)(i)(1)</font> is declared or announced, but not so paid or made, then the Conversion Rate will be readjusted, effective as of the date the Board of Directors determines not to pay such dividend or distribution or to effect such stock split or stock combination, to the Conversion Rate that would then be in effect had such dividend, distribution, stock split or stock combination not been declared or announced.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref114404775"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(2)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Rights, Options and Warrants</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Company distributes, to all or substantially all holders of Common Shares, rights, options or warrants (other than rights issued or otherwise distributed pursuant to a stockholder rights plan, as to which the provisions set forth in </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Sections 8(G)(i)(3)(a)</font><font style="color:#000000;"> and </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">8(G)(v) </font><font style="color:#000000;">will apply) entitling such holders, for a period of not more than sixty (60) calendar days after the record date of such distribution, to subscribe for or purchase Common Shares at a price per share that is less than the average of the Last Reported Sale Prices per Common Share for the ten (10) consecutive Trading Days ending on, and including, the Trading Day immediately before the date such distribution is announced, then the Conversion Rate will be increased based on the following formula:</font></p><a name="_cp_text_6_36"></a>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><img src="g5ojowbhnc3e000002.jpg" title="" alt="" style="width:134px;height:43px;"></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">where:</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">CR</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">0</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the Conversion Rate in effect immediately before the Open of Business on the Ex-Dividend Date for such distribution;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">CR</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">1</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the Conversion Rate in effect immediately after the Open of Business on such Ex-Dividend Date;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">

<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">

<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">OS</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the number of Common Shares outstanding immediately before the Open of Business on such Ex-Dividend Date;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">X</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the total number of Common Shares issuable pursuant to such rights, options or warrants; and</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Y</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=a number of Common Shares obtained by dividing (x) the aggregate price payable to exercise such rights, options or warrants by (y) the average of the Last Reported Sale Prices per Common Share for the ten (10) consecutive Trading Days ending on, and including, the Trading Day immediately before the date such distribution is announced.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 32</a> -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap"></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">To the extent that Common Shares are not delivered after the expiration of such rights, options or warrants (including as a result of such rights, options or warrants not being exercised), the Conversion Rate will be readjusted to the Conversion Rate that would then be in effect had the increase to the Conversion Rate for such distribution been made on the basis of delivery of only the number of Common Shares actually delivered upon exercise of such rights, option or warrants.&nbsp;&nbsp;To the extent such rights, options or warrants are not so distributed, the Conversion Rate will be readjusted to the Conversion Rate that would then be in effect had the Ex-Dividend Date for the distribution of such rights, options or warrants not occurred.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">For purposes of this <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(G)(i)(2)</font>, in determining whether any rights, options or warrants entitle holders of Common Shares to subscribe for or purchase Common Shares at a price per share that is less than the average of the Last Reported Sale Prices per Common Share for the ten (10) consecutive Trading Days ending on, and including, the Trading Day immediately before the date the distribution of such rights, options or warrants is announced, and in determining the aggregate price payable to exercise such rights, options or warrants, there will be taken into account any consideration the Company receives for such rights, options or warrants and any amount payable on exercise thereof, with the value of such consideration, if not cash, to be determined by the Board of Directors in good faith.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref367262631"></a><a name="_Ref17301167"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(3)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Spin-Offs and Other Distributed Property</font><font style="color:#000000;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:7.69%;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><a name="_Ref367280679"></a>Distributions Other than Spin-Offs<font style="font-style:normal;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Company distributes shares of its Capital Stock, evidences of its indebtedness or other assets or property of the Company, or rights, options or warrants to acquire Capital Stock of the Company or other securities, to all or substantially all holders of the Common Shares, excluding:</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:30.77%;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(v)<font style="margin-left:36pt;">dividends, distributions, rights, options or warrants for which an adjustment to the Conversion Rate is required pursuant to </font><font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(G)(i)(1)</font> or <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(G)(i)(2)</font>;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:30.77%;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(w)<font style="margin-left:36pt;">dividends or distributions paid exclusively in cash for which an adjustment to the Conversion Rate is required pursuant to </font><font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(G)(i)(4)</font>;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:30.77%;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(x)<font style="margin-left:36pt;">rights issued or otherwise distributed pursuant to a stockholder rights plan, except to the extent provided in </font><font style="font-weight:bold;">Section </font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 33</a> -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:30.77%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-weight:bold;">8(G)(v)</font><font style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">;</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:30.77%;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(y)<font style="margin-left:36pt;">Spin-Offs for which an adjustment to the Conversion Rate is required pursuant to </font><font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(G)(i)(3)(b)</font>; and</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:30.77%;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(z)<font style="margin-left:36pt;">a distribution solely pursuant to a Common Shares Change Event, as to which </font><font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(J)</font> will apply,</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">then the Conversion Rate will be increased based on the following formula:</p><a name="_cp_text_6_37"></a>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><img src="g5ojowbhnc3e000003.jpg" title="" alt="" style="width:153px;height:43px;"></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">where:</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:23.08%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">CR</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">0</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the Conversion Rate in effect immediately before the Open of Business on the Ex-Dividend Date for such distribution;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:23.08%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">CR</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">1</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the Conversion Rate in effect immediately after the Open of Business on such Ex-Dividend Date;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:23.08%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">SP</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the average of the Last Reported Sale Prices per Common Share for the ten (10) consecutive Trading Days ending on, and including, the Trading Day immediately before such Ex-Dividend Date; and</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:23.08%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">FMV</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the fair market value (as determined by the Board of Directors in good faith), as of such Ex-Dividend Date, of the shares of Capital Stock, evidences of indebtedness, assets, property, rights, options or warrants distributed per Common Share pursuant to such distribution;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">provided<font style="font-style:normal;">, </font>however<font style="font-style:normal;">, that if </font>FMV<font style="font-style:normal;"> is equal to or greater than </font>SP<font style="font-style:normal;">, then, in lieu of the foregoing adjustment to the Conversion Rate, the Holder will receive, for each $1,000 Principal Amount of this Note held by this Holder on the record date for such distribution, at the same time and on the same terms as holders of Common Shares, the amount and kind of shares of Capital Stock, evidences of indebtedness, assets, property, rights, options or warrants that such Holder would have received if such Holder had owned, on such record date, a number of Common Shares equal to the Conversion Rate in effect on such record date.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">To the extent such distribution is not so paid or made, the Conversion Rate will be readjusted to the Conversion Rate that would then be in effect had the adjustment been made on the basis of only the distribution, if any, </p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 34</a> -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">actually made or paid.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:7.69%;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><a name="_Ref417035412"></a><a name="_Ref367277489"></a>Spin-Offs<font style="font-style:normal;"><a name="_Ref367277489"></a>.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Company distributes or dividends shares of Capital Stock of any class or series, or similar equity interest, of or relating to an Affiliate, a Subsidiary or other business unit of the Company to all or substantially all holders of the Common Shares (other than solely pursuant to a Common Shares Change Event, as to which </font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;">Section 8(J)</font><font style="font-style:normal;"> will apply), and such Capital Stock or equity interest is listed or quoted (or will be listed or quoted upon the consummation of the transaction) on a U.S. national securities exchange (a &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;">Spin-Off</font><font style="font-style:normal;">&#8221;), then the Conversion Rate will be increased based on the following formula:</font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><img src="g5ojowbhnc3e000004.jpg" title="" alt="" style="width:153px;height:43px;"></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">where:</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:23.08%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">CR</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">0</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the Conversion Rate in effect immediately before the Open of Business on the Ex-Dividend Date for such Spin-Off;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:23.08%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">CR</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">1</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the Conversion Rate in effect immediately after the Open of Business on such Ex-Dividend Date;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:23.08%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">FMV</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the product of (x) the average of the Last Reported Sale Prices per share or unit of the Capital Stock or equity interests distributed in such Spin-Off over the ten (10) consecutive Trading Day period (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;">Spin-Off Valuation Period</font><font style="font-style:normal;">&#8221;) beginning on, and including, such Ex-Dividend Date (such average to be determined as if references to Common Shares in the definitions of Last Reported Sale Price, Trading Day and Market Disruption Event were instead references to such Capital Stock or equity interests); and (y) the number of shares or units of such Capital Stock or equity interests distributed per Common Share in such Spin-Off; and</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:23.08%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">SP</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the average of the Last Reported Sale Prices per Common Share for each Trading Day in the Spin-Off Valuation Period.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The adjustment to the Conversion Rate pursuant to this <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(G)(i)(3)(b)</font> will be calculated as of the Close of Business on the last Trading Day of the Spin-Off Valuation Period but will be given effect immediately after the Open of Business on the Ex-Dividend Date for the Spin-Off, with retroactive effect.&nbsp;&nbsp;If a Note is converted and the Conversion </p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 35</a> -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Date occurs during the Spin-Off Valuation Period, then, notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this Note, the Company will, if necessary, delay the settlement of such conversion until the second (2nd) Business Day after the last day of the Spin-Off Valuation Period.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">To the extent any dividend or distribution of the type set forth in this <font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(G)(i)(3)(b)</font> is declared but not made or paid, the Conversion Rate will be readjusted to the Conversion Rate that would then be in effect had the adjustment been made on the basis of only the dividend or distribution, if any, actually made or paid.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref367262634"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(4)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Cash Dividends (Other than in the Ordinary Course) or Distributions</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;If any cash dividend or distribution is made to all or substantially all holders of Common Shares, then the Conversion Rate will be increased based on the following formula:</font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><img src="g5ojowbhnc3e000005.jpg" title="" alt="" style="width:130px;height:43px;"></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">where:</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">CR</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">0</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the Conversion Rate in effect immediately before the Open of Business on the Ex-Dividend Date for such dividend or distribution;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">CR</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">1</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the Conversion Rate in effect immediately after the Open of Business on such Ex-Dividend Date;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">SP</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the Last Reported Sale Price per Common Share on the Trading Day immediately before such Ex-Dividend Date; and</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">D</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the cash amount distributed per Common Share in such dividend or distribution;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">provided<font style="font-style:normal;">, </font>however<font style="font-style:normal;">, that if </font>D<font style="font-style:normal;"> is equal to or greater than </font>SP<font style="font-style:normal;">, then, in lieu of the foregoing adjustment to the Conversion Rate, the Holder will receive, for each $1,000 Principal Amount of this Note held by the Holder on the record date for such dividend or distribution, at the same time and on the same terms as holders of Common Shares, the amount of cash that such Holder would have received if such Holder had owned, on such record date, a number of Common Shares equal to the Conversion Rate in effect on such record date.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">To the extent such dividend or distribution is declared but not made or paid, the Conversion Rate will be readjusted to the Conversion Rate that would then be in effect had the adjustment been made on the basis of only the dividend or distribution, if any, actually made or paid.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 36</a> -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref83464904"></a><a name="_Ref96671361"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(5)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Tender Offers or Exchange Offers</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Company or any of its Subsidiaries makes a payment in respect of a tender offer or exchange offer for Common Shares (other than solely pursuant to an odd-lot tender offer pursuant to Rule 13e-4(h)(5) under the Exchange Act), and the value (determined as of the Expiration Time by the Board of Directors in good faith) of the cash and other consideration paid per Common Share in such tender or exchange offer exceeds the Last Reported Sale Price per Common Share on the Trading Day immediately after the last date (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Expiration Date</font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8221;) on which tenders or exchanges may be made pursuant to such tender or exchange offer (as it may be amended), then the Conversion Rate will be increased based on the following formula:</font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><img src="g5ojowbhnc3e000006.jpg" title="" alt="" style="width:187px;height:44px;"></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">where:</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">CR</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">0</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the Conversion Rate in effect immediately before the time (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;">Expiration Time</font><font style="font-style:normal;">&#8221;) such tender or exchange offer expires;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">CR</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">1</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the Conversion Rate in effect immediately after the Expiration Time;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">AC</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the aggregate value (determined as of the Expiration Time by the Board of Directors in good faith) of all cash and other consideration paid for Common Shares purchased or exchanged in such tender or exchange offer;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">OS</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">0</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the number of Common Shares outstanding immediately before the Expiration Time (including all Common Shares accepted for purchase or exchange in such tender or exchange offer);</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">OS</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">1</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the number of Common Shares outstanding immediately after the Expiration Time (excluding all Common Shares accepted for purchase or exchange in such tender or exchange offer); and</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">SP</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the average of the Last Reported Sale Prices per Common Share over the ten (10) consecutive Trading Day period (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;">Tender/Exchange Offer Valuation Period</font><font style="font-style:normal;">&#8221;) beginning on, and including, the Trading Day immediately after the Expiration Date;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">provided<font style="font-style:normal;">, </font>however<font style="font-style:normal;">, that the Conversion Rate will in no event be adjusted down pursuant to this </font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;">Section 8(G)(i)(5)</font><font style="font-style:normal;">, except to the extent provided in the immediately following paragraph.&nbsp;&nbsp;The adjustment to the Conversion Rate pursuant to this </font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;">Section 8(G)(i)(5)</font><font style="font-style:normal;"> will be calculated as of the Close of Business on the last Trading Day of the Tender/Exchange Offer Valuation Period but will be given effect immediately after the Expiration Time, with retroactive effect.&nbsp;&nbsp;If a Note is </font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 37</a> -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:normal;">converted and the Conversion Date occurs on the Expiration Date or during the Tender/Exchange Offer Valuation Period, then, notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this Note, the Company will, if necessary, delay the settlement of such conversion until the second (2nd) Business Day after the last day of the Tender/Exchange Offer Valuation Period.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">To the extent such tender or exchange offer is announced but not consummated (including as a result of the Company being precluded from consummating such tender or exchange offer under applicable law), or any purchases or exchanges of Common Shares in such tender or exchange offer are rescinded, the Conversion Rate will be readjusted to the Conversion Rate that would then be in effect had the adjustment been made on the basis of only the purchases or exchanges of Common Shares, if any, actually made, and not rescinded, in such tender or exchange offer.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref16869182"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(ii)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">No Adjustments in Certain Cases</font><font style="color:#000000;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref473137617"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(1)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Where the Holder Participates in the Transaction or Event Without Conversion</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 8(G)(i)</font><font style="color:#000000;">, the Company will not be obligated to adjust the Conversion Rate on account of a transaction or other event otherwise requiring an adjustment pursuant to </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 8(G)(i)</font><font style="color:#000000;"> (other than a stock split or combination of the type set forth in </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 8(G)(i)(1)</font><font style="color:#000000;"> or a tender or exchange offer of the type set forth in </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 8(G)(i)(5)</font><font style="color:#000000;">) if the Holder participates, at the same time and on the same terms as holders of Common Shares, and solely by virtue of being the Holder of this Note, in such transaction or event without having to convert this Note and as if the Holder held a number of Common Shares equal to the product of (i) the Conversion Rate in effect on the related record date; and (ii) the aggregate Principal Amount (expressed in thousands) of this Note held by this Holder on such date. Any such participation will be subject to the prior approval of the TSX.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref473189563"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(2)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Certain Events</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company will not adjust the Conversion Rate except as provided in </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 8(G)</font><font style="color:#000000;">, </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 8(H) </font><font style="color:#000000;">or</font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;"> Section 8(I)</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;Without limiting the foregoing, the Company will not adjust the Conversion Rate on account of:</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(a)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">the sale of Common Shares, even if the purchase price is less than the market price per share of the Common Shares or less than the Conversion Price;</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><a name="_Ref473137624"></a>the issuance of any Common Shares pursuant to any present or future plan providing for the reinvestment of dividends or interest payable on the Company&#8217;s securities and the investment of additional optional amounts in Common Shares under any such plan;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><a name="_Ref473137626"></a>the issuance of any Common Shares, restricted stock, or options or rights to purchase Common Shares pursuant to any present or future employee, director or consultant benefit plan or program of, or assumed by, the Company or any of its Subsidiaries;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">the issuance of any Common Shares pursuant to any option, warrant, right or convertible or exchangeable security of the Company outstanding </p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:12pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">
<p style="margin-top:12pt;text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>- 38</a> -</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8pt;"><a name="_cp_textHF_1_72"></a>&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:right;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">as of the Issue Date (other than an adjustment pursuant to </font><font style="font-weight:bold;">Section 8(G)(i)(3)(a)</font><font style="font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"> in connection with the separation of rights under the Company&#8217;s stockholder rights plan existing, if any, as of the Issue Date);</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">solely a change in the par value of the Common Shares; or</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">accrued and unpaid interest, if any, on this Note.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref432523419"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(iii)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Adjustments Not Yet Effective.</font><font style="color:#000000;">&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding anything to the contrary in this Note, if:</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(1)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">this Note is to be converted;</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(2)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">the record date, effective date or Expiration Time for any event that requires an adjustment to the Conversion Rate pursuant to </font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Section 8(G)(i)</font><font style="color:#000000;"> has occurred on or before the Conversion Date for such conversion, but an adjustment to the Conversion Rate for such event has not yet become effective as of such Conversion Date;</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(3)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">the Conversion Consideration due upon such conversion includes any whole Common Shares; and</font></p>
