<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(e)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Listing</font><font style="color:#000000;">.</font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">The Company covenants that if at any time its shares of Common Stock shall be listed on any national securities exchange or automated quotation system, the Company will list and keep listed, so long as its shares of Common Stock shall be so listed on such exchange or automated quotation system, any shares of Common Stock issuable upon conversion of this Note.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(f)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Resale of Securities</font><font style="color:#000000;">.</font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">The Holder agrees that it will not re-sell or make the first trade in this Note or the Conversion Shares in Canada or through the facilities of the Toronto Stock Exchange.&nbsp;&nbsp;For the avoidance &#8206;of doubt, the parties hereto acknowledge and agree that any </font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">10</a></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="color:#000000;">sales of Conversion Shares in the United &#8206;States or through the facilities of NASDAQ are not subject to any such restrictions&#8206;.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">7.</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Events of Default</font><font style="color:#000000;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(a)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Events of Default</font><font style="color:#000000;">. Each of the following events shall be an &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Event of Default</font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8221; with respect to this Note:&#8206;</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:23.08%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(i)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">default in the payment of principal or accrued interest of this Note when due and payable on the &#8206;Maturity Date, upon any redemption, upon any required repurchase, upon declaration of &#8206;acceleration or otherwise;&#8206;</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:23.08%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(ii)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">failure by the Company to comply with its obligation to convert this Note in &#8206;accordance with the terms hereof upon exercise of the Holder&#8217;s conversion right and such failure &#8206;continues for a period of three (3) Business Days;&#8206;</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:23.08%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(iii)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">failure by the Company to issue a Fundamental Change Company Notice in &#8206;accordance with Section 11 of this Note when due;&#8206;</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:23.08%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(iv)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">failure by the Company to comply with its obligations under Section 8 of this Note;</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:23.08%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(v)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">failure by the Company for 60 days after written notice from the Holder has been received &#8206;by the Company to comply with any of its other agreements contained in the this Note;&#8206;</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:23.08%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(vi)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">default by the Company or any Subsidiaries of the Company with respect to any &#8206;mortgage, agreement or other instrument under which there may be outstanding, or by which &#8206;there may be secured or evidenced, any indebtedness for money borrowed in excess of &#8206;&#8206;$15,000,000 (or its foreign currency equivalent) in the aggregate of the Company and/or any &#8206;such Subsidiary, whether such indebtedness now exists or shall hereafter be created (i) &#8206;resulting in such indebtedness becoming or being declared due and payable prior to its stated &#8206;maturity date or (ii) constituting a failure to pay the principal or interest of any such &#8206;indebtedness when due and payable, at its stated maturity, upon required repurchase, upon &#8206;declaration of acceleration or otherwise;&#8206;</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:23.08%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(vii)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">a final judgment or judgments for the payment in excess of $15,000,000 (or its &#8206;foreign currency equivalent) (excluding any amounts covered by insurance) in the aggregate &#8206;rendered against the Company or any Subsidiary of the Company, which judgment is not &#8206;discharged, bonded, paid, waived or stayed within 60 days after (i) the date on which the &#8206;right to appeal thereof has expired if no such appeal has commenced, or (ii) the date on &#8206;which all rights to appeal have been extinguished;&#8206;</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:23.08%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(viii)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">the Company or any Significant Subsidiary shall commence a voluntary case or &#8206;other proceeding seeking liquidation, reorganization or other relief with respect to the &#8206;Company or any such Significant Subsidiary or its debts under any bankruptcy, insolvency or &#8206;other similar law now or hereafter in effect or seeking the appointment of a trustee, receiver, &#8206;liquidator, custodian or other similar official of the Company or any such Significant &#8206;Subsidiary o</font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">11</a></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="color:#000000;">r any substantial part of its property, or shall consent to any such relief or to the &#8206;appointment of or taking possession by any such official in an involuntary </font><font style="color:#000000;">case or other &#8206;proceeding commenced against it, or shall make a general assignment for the benefit of &#8206;creditors, or shall fail generally to pay its debts as they become due; or</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:23.08%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(ix)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">an involuntary case or other proceeding shall be commenced against the Company or any &#8206;Significant Subsidiary seeking liquidation, reorganization or other relief with respect to the &#8206;Company or such Significant Subsidiary or its debts under any bankruptcy, insolvency or other &#8206;similar law now or hereafter in effect or seeking the appointment of a trustee, receiver, &#8206;liquidator, custodian or other similar official of the Company or such Significant Subsidiary or &#8206;any substantial part of its property, and such involuntary case or other proceeding shall remain &#8206;undismissed and unstayed for a period of 30 consecutive days&#8206;.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(b)</font><font style="text-decoration:underline;margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">Acceleration; Rescission and Annulment</font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">. </font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:23.08%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(i)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">If one or more Events of Default shall have occurred and &#8206;be continuing (whatever the reason for such Event of Default and whether it shall be voluntary or &#8206;involuntary or be effected by operation of law or pursuant to any judgment, decree or order of any &#8206;court or any order, rule or regulation of any administrative or governmental body), then, and in &#8206;each and every such case (other than an Event of Default specified in Section 7(a)(viii) or Section 7(a)(ix) with respect to the Company), unless the principal of this Note shall have already &#8206;become due and payable, the Holder, by notice to the Company, may declare 100% of the principal of, and accrued and unpaid &#8206;interest on, this Note to be due and payable immediately, and upon any such declaration the &#8206;same shall become and shall automatically be immediately due and payable, anything contained in &#8206;this Note to the contrary notwithstanding. If an Event of Default specified in &#8206; Section 7(a)(viii) or Section 7(a)(ix) with respect to the Company occurs and is continuing, 100% of the &#8206;principal of, and accrued and unpaid interest, if any, on, all Note shall become and shall &#8206;automatically be immediately due and payable&#8206;.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:23.08%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(ii)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">The immediately preceding paragraph, however, is subject to the conditions that if, at any &#8206;time after the principal of this Note shall have been so declared due and payable, and before any &#8206;judgment or decree for the payment of the monies due shall have been obtained or entered as &#8206;hereinafter provided, and if (x) rescission would not conflict with any judgment or decree of a court &#8206;of competent jurisdiction and (y) any and all existing Events of Default under this Note, other &#8206;than the nonpayment of the principal of and accrued and unpaid interest, if any, on this Note that shall &#8206;have become due solely by such acceleration, shall have been cured or waived, then and in every such case (except as provided in the immediately succeeding sentence) the &#8206;Holder, by notice to the &#8206;Company, may waive all Defaults or Events of Default with respect to this Note &#8206;and rescind and annul such declaration and its consequences and such Default shall cease to exist, &#8206;and any Event of Default arising therefrom shall be deemed to have been cured for every purpose of &#8206;this Note; but no such waiver or rescission and annulment shall extend to or shall affect any &#8206;subsequent Default or Event of Default, or shall impair any right consequent thereon.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">12</a></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;">(c)</font><font style="text-decoration:underline;margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">Payment of Note on Defau</font><font style="font-style:italic;text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">lt; Suit Therefor</font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">. </font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:23.08%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(i)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">If an Event of Default shall have occurred and be &#8206;continuing, the Company shall, upon demand of the Holder, pay to the Holder, the whole amount then due and payable on this Note for principal and interest, if any, with &#8206;interest on any overdue principal and interest, if any, at the rate borne by this Note at such time. If the Company shall fail to pay such amounts forthwith upon such &#8206;demand, the Holder may institute a judicial &#8206;proceeding for the collection of the sums so due and unpaid, may prosecute such proceeding to &#8206;judgment or final decree and may enforce the same against the Company and collect the moneys adjudged or decreed to be payable in the manner provided by law &#8206;out of the property of the Company upon this Note, wherever situated.&#8206;</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:23.08%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(ii)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">In the event there shall be pending proceedings for the bankruptcy or for the reorganization &#8206;of the Company on this Note under Title 11 of the United States Code, or any &#8206;other applicable law, or in case a receiver, assignee or trustee in bankruptcy or reorganization, &#8206;liquidator, sequestrator or similar official shall have been appointed for or taken possession of the &#8206;Company or such other obligor, the property of the Company, or in the event of &#8206;any other judicial proceedings relative to the Company upon this Note, or to &#8206;the creditors or property of the Company or such other obligor, the Holder, irrespective of whether &#8206;the principal of this Note shall then be due and payable as therein expressed or by declaration or &#8206;otherwise and irrespective of whether the Holder shall have made any demand pursuant to the &#8206;provisions of this Section 7(c), shall be entitled and empowered, by intervention in such proceedings &#8206;or otherwise, to file and prove a claim or claims for the whole amount of principal and accrued and &#8206;unpaid interest, if any, in respect of this Note, and, in case of any judicial proceedings, to file such &#8206;proofs of claim and other papers or documents and to take such other actions as it may deem &#8206;necessary or advisable in order to have the claims of the Holder allowed in such judicial proceedings relative to the Company on this Note, its creditors, or its property, and to collect and receive &#8206;any monies or other property payable or deliverable on any such claims, and to distribute the same. To the &#8206;extent that such payment of reasonable compensation, expenses, advances and disbursements out of &#8206;the estate in any such proceedings shall be denied for any reason, payment of the same shall be &#8206;secured by a lien on, and shall be paid out of, any and all distributions, dividends, monies, securities &#8206;and other property that the Holder may be entitled to receive in such proceedings, whether in &#8206;liquidation or under any plan of reorganization or arrangement or otherwise.&#8206; </font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(d)</font><font style="text-decoration:underline;margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">Proceedings by Holder</font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">. The &#8206;Holder shall have the right to institute suit for the enforcement of its right to receive payment or &#8206;delivery, as the case may be, of (x) the principal (including the Redemption Amount, if applicable) of, (y) accrued and unpaid interest, if any, on, &#8206;and (z) the consideration due upon conversion of, this Note, on or after the respective due dates &#8206;expressed or provided for in this Note, or to institute suit for the enforcement of &#8206;any such payment or delivery, as the case may be, and such right to receive such payment or &#8206;delivery, as the case may be, on or after such respective dates shall not be impaired or affected &#8206;without the consent of the Holder&#8206;.&#8206; </font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(e)</font><font style="text-decoration:underline;margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">Remedies Cumulative and Continuing</font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">. All &#8206;powers and remedies given by this Section 6 to the Holder shall, to the extent &#8206;permitted by law, be deemed cumulative and not exclusive of any thereof or of any other powers and &#8206;remedies available to the Holder, by judicial proceedings or otherwise, to enforce the &#8206;performance or observance of the covenants and </font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">13</a></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">agreements contained in this Note, and no &#8206;delay or omission of the Holder to exercise any right or power &#8206;accruing upon any Default or Event of Default shall impair any such right or power, or shall be &#8206;construed to be a waiver of any such</font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;"> Default or Event of Default or any acquiescence therein; and, &#8206;subject to the provisions of Section 6(d), every power and remedy given by this Section 6 or by law &#8206;to the Holder may be exercised from time to time, and as often as shall be deemed &#8206;expedien</font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">t, by the Holder&#8206;.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref105418097"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">8.</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Consolidation, Merger, Amalgamation, Sale, Conveyance and Lease</font><font style="color:#000000;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(a)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Company May Consolidate, Etc. on Certain Terms</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the provisions of Section 7(b), the Company shall not consolidate or amalgamate with, undertaking an arrangement with, or merge with or into, or sell, convey, transfer or lease all or substantially all of its properties and assets to another Person, unless:</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:23.08%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(i)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">the resulting, surviving or transferee Person (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Successor Company</font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8221;), if not the Company, shall expressly assume all of the obligations of the Company under this Note; and </font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:23.08%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(ii)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">immediately after giving effect to such transaction, no Event of Default has occurred and is continuing under this Note.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:23.08%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(iii)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">For purposes of this Section 7(a), the sale, conveyance, transfer or lease of all or &#8206;substantially all of the properties and assets of one or more Subsidiaries of the Company to another &#8206;Person, which properties and assets, if held by the Company instead of such Subsidiaries, would &#8206;constitute all or substantially all of the properties and assets of the Company on a consolidated &#8206;basis, shall be deemed to be the sale, conveyance, transfer or lease of all or substantially all of the &#8206;properties and assets of the Company to another Person.&#8206;</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#000000;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0.05pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(b)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;">Successor Corporation to Be Substituted</font>. In case of any such consolidation, merger, amalgamation, arrangement, sale, conveyance, transfer or lease and upon the assumption by the Successor Company (if not the Company), of the due and punctual payment of the principal of and accrued and unpaid interest on this Note, the due and punctual delivery or payment, as the case may be, of any consideration due upon conversion of this Note and the due and punctual performance of all of the covenants and conditions of this Note to be performed by the Company, such Successor Company (if not the Company) shall succeed to and, except in the case of a lease of all or substantially all of the Company&#8217;s properties and assets, shall be substituted for the Company, with the same effect as if it had been named herein as the party of the first part, and may thereafter exercise every right and power of the Company under this Note. </p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">9.</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;">Conversion</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Note shall be convertible, prior to the Maturity Date, into shares of Common Stock on the terms and subject to the conditions set forth in this Section 9 or as contemplated in Section 2 of this Note.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Hlk105181101"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(a)</font><font style="text-decoration:underline;margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;text-decoration:none;color:#000000;"><a name="_Hlk105181101"></a>Optional Conversion Right</font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Holder has the right (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">Optional Conversion Right</font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">&#8221;), from time to time, at any time on or prior to 5:00 p.m. (New York time) on the second (2<sup style="font-size:85%;line-height:120%;vertical-align:top">nd</sup>) Trading Day immediately preceding the Maturity Date to convert all or any portion of unpaid principal and accrued and unpaid interest under this Note (such amount, the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">Conversion Amount</font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">&#8221;) into the number of Conversion Shares equal to the quotient of (i) the Conversion </font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">14</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">Amount </font><font style="font-style:italic;text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">divided by</font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;"> (ii) the Conversion Price; provided that such aggregate number of such Conversion Shares shall be reduced, as necessary, such that the aggregate number of shares of Common Stock issued to the Holder pursuant to the Opti</font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">onal Conversion Right shall not result in the issuance of more than 20,000,000 Conversion Shares (subject to adjustment for any stock splits, stock dividends or similar transaction) to the Holder under this Note without the prior written consent of the Com</font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">pany (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">Maximum Conversion Shares</font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">&#8221;), and in lieu of the issuance of such number of Conversion Shares in excess of the Maximum Conversion Shares (such aggregate reduced number of Conversion Shares, the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">Reduced Conversion Share Amount</font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">&#8221;) the Company shall</font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;"> pay to the Holder a cash amount equal to the product of (x) such Reduced Conversion Share Amount and (y) the VWAP of the Common Stock as of the applicable Conversion Date (as defined below).</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(b)</font><font style="text-decoration:underline;margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">Mechanics of Conversion</font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:23.08%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(i)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">To convert any Conversion Amount into Conversion Shares on any date (a &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Conversion Date</font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8221;), the Holder shall transmit by email or facsimile with confirmation of delivery (or otherwise deliver by method set forth in Section 11 of the Assignment and Assumption Agreement), for receipt on or prior to 11:59 p.m., New York Time, on such date, a copy of an executed notice of conversion in the form attached hereto as Exhibit A (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Conversion Notice</font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8221;) to the Company.&nbsp;&nbsp;On or before the second (2nd) Business Day following the date of receipt of a Conversion Notice, the Company shall (A) provided that the Company&#8217;s transfer agent is participating in the Depository Trust Company&#8217;s (&#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">DTC</font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8221;) Fast Automated Securities Transfer Program, credit such aggregate number of shares of Common Stock to which the Holder shall be entitled to the Holder&#8217;s or its designee&#8217;s balance account with DTC through its Deposit Withdrawal Agent Commission system or (B) if the transfer agent is not participating in the DTC Fast Automated Securities Transfer Program, issue and deliver to the address as specified in the Conversion Notice, a certificate, registered in the name of the Holder or its designee, for the number of shares of Common Stock to which the Holder shall be entitled which certificates shall not bear any restrictive legends.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Person or Persons entitled to receive the shares of Common Stock issuable upon a conversion of this Note shall be treated for all purposes as the record holder or holders of such shares of Common Stock upon the transmission of a Conversion Notice.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:23.08%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(ii)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">No fractional shares shall be issued upon conversion of this Note. Upon the conversion of all of the Obligations outstanding under this Note, in lieu of issuing any fractional shares to the Holder, the number of shares issued to the Holder shall be rounded to the nearest whole share.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon full conversion or redemption of this Note, the Company shall be forever released from all its obligations and liabilities under this Note.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref105181465"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(c)</font><font style="text-decoration:underline;margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">Limitations on Conversions</font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained herein, the Company shall not effect the conversion of any portion of this Note, and the Holder shall not have the right to convert any portion of this Note, pursuant to the terms and conditions of this Note and any such conversion shall be null and void and treated as if never made, to the extent that after giving effect to such conversion, the Holder together with the other Attribution Parties collectively would beneficially own in excess of the Maximum Percentage of the number of shares of Common Stock outstanding immediately after giving effect to such conversion.&nbsp;&nbsp;For purposes of the foregoing sentence, the aggregate number of shares of Common Stock beneficially owned by the Holder and the other Attribution Parties shall include the number </font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">15</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">of shar</font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">es of Common Stock held by the Holder and all other Attribution Parties plus the number of shares of Common Stock issuable upon conversion of this Note with respect to which the determination of such sentence is being made, but shall exclude the number of </font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">shares of Common Stock which would be issuable upon (x) conversion of the remaining, unconverted portion of this Note beneficially owned by the Holder or any of the other Attribution Parties and (y) exercise or conversion of the unexercised or unconverted </font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">portion of any other securities of the Company (including, without limitation, any convertible notes or convertible preferred stock or warrants) beneficially owned by the Holder or any other Attribution Party subject to a limitation on conversion or exerci</font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">se analogous to the limitation contained in this Section </font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">9(c)</font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;For purposes of this Section </font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">9(c)</font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;">, beneficial ownership shall be calculated in accordance with Section 13(d) of the Exchange Act.</font><font style="text-decoration:none;color:#000000;"> </font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(d)</font><font style="text-decoration:underline;margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;text-decoration:underline;color:#000000;">Adjustments to the Conversion Rate</font><font style="text-decoration:underline;color:#000000;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref16868401"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(i)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Events Requiring an Adjustment to the Conversion Rate</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Conversion Rate will be adjusted from time to time as follows:</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref417033128"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(1)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Stock Dividends, Splits and Combinations</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Company issues solely shares of Common Stock as a dividend or distribution on all or substantially all shares of Common Stock, or if the Company effects a stock split or a stock combination of the shares of Common Stock (in each case excluding an issuance solely pursuant to a Fundamental Change, as to which Section 11 will apply), then the Conversion Rate will be adjusted based on the following formula:</font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><img src="ggvwl00lpuw3000001.jpg" title="" alt="" style="width:116px;height:47px;"></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">where:</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">CR</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">0</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the Conversion Rate in effect immediately before the Open of Business on the Ex-Dividend Date for such dividend or distribution, or immediately before the Open of Business on the effective date of such stock split or stock combination, as applicable;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">CR</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">1</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the Conversion Rate in effect immediately after the Open of Business on such Ex-Dividend Date or the Open of Business on such effective date, as applicable;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">OS</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">0</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the number of shares of Common Stock outstanding immediately before the Open of Business on such Ex-Dividend Date or effective date, as applicable, without giving effect to such dividend, distribution, stock split or stock combination; and</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">OS</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">1</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the number of shares of Common Stock outstanding immediately after giving effect to such dividend, distribution, stock split or stock combination.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">16</a></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Any adjustment made under this Section 9(d)(i)(1) shall become effective immediately after the Open of Business on the Ex-Dividend Date for such dividend or distribution, or immediately after the Open of Business on the effective date for such share split or stock combination, as applicable. If any dividend, distribution, stock split or stock combination of the type described in this Section 9(d)(i)(1) is declared or announced, but not so paid or made, then the Conversion Rate will be readjusted, effective as of the date the Board of Directors determines not to pay such dividend or distribution or to effect such stock split or stock combination, to the Conversion Rate that would then be in effect had such dividend, distribution, stock split or stock combination not been declared or announced.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref114404775"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(2)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Rights, Options and Warrants</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Company distributes, to all or substantially all holders of shares of Common Stock, rights, options or warrants (other than rights issued or otherwise distributed pursuant to a stockholder rights plan, as to which the provisions set forth in Sections 9(d)(i)(3)(a) and 9(d)(v) will apply) entitling such holders, for a period of not more than sixty (60) calendar days after the record date of such distribution, to subscribe for or purchase shares of Common Stock at a price per share that is less than the average of the Last Reported Sale Prices per share of Common Stock for the ten (10) consecutive Trading Days ending on, and including, the Trading Day immediately before the date such distribution is announced, then the Conversion Rate will be increased based on the following formula:</font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><a name="_cp_text_6_36"></a><img src="ggvwl00lpuw3000002.jpg" title="" alt="" style="width:134px;height:43px;"></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">where:</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">CR</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">0</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the Conversion Rate in effect immediately before the Open of Business on the Ex-Dividend Date for such distribution;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">CR</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">1</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the Conversion Rate in effect immediately after the Open of Business on such Ex-Dividend Date;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">OS</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the number of shares of Common Stock outstanding immediately before the Open of Business on such Ex-Dividend Date;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">X</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the total number of shares of Common Stock issuable pursuant to such rights, options or warrants; and</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Y</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=a number of shares of Common Stock obtained by dividing (x) the aggregate price payable to exercise such rights, options or warrants by (y) the average of the Last Reported Sale Prices per share of Common Stock for the ten (10) consecutive Trading Days ending on, and including, the Trading Day immediately before the date such distribution is announced.</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">17</a></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Any increase made under this Section 9(d)(i)(2) shall be made successively &#8206;whenever any such rights, options or warrants are issued and shall become &#8206;effective immediately after the Open of Business on the Ex-Dividend Date for &#8206;such issuance. &#8206;To the extent that shares of Common Stock are not delivered after the expiration of such rights, options or warrants (including as a result of such rights, options or warrants not being exercised), the Conversion Rate will be readjusted to the Conversion Rate that would then be in effect had the increase to the Conversion Rate for such distribution been made on the basis of delivery of only the number of shares of Common Stock actually delivered upon exercise of such rights, option or warrants.&nbsp;&nbsp;To the extent such rights, options or warrants are not so distributed, the Conversion Rate will be readjusted to the Conversion Rate that would then be in effect had the Ex-Dividend Date for the distribution of such rights, options or warrants not occurred.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">For purposes of this Section 9(d)(i)(2), in determining whether any rights, options or warrants entitle holders of shares of Common Stock to subscribe for or purchase shares of Common Stock at a price per share that is less than the average of the Last Reported Sale Prices per share of Common Stock for the ten (10) consecutive Trading Days ending on, and including, the Trading Day immediately before the date the distribution of such rights, options or warrants is announced, and in determining the aggregate price payable to exercise such rights, options or warrants, there will be taken into account any consideration the Company receives for such rights, options or warrants and any amount payable on exercise thereof, with the value of such consideration, if not cash, to be determined by the Board of Directors in good faith.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.69%;text-indent:15.38%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref367262631"></a><a name="_Ref17301167"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(3)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Spin-Offs and Other Distributed Property</font><font style="color:#000000;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref367280679"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(a)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Distributions Other than Spin-Offs</font><font style="color:#000000;">.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Company distributes shares of its Capital Stock, evidences of its indebtedness or other assets or property of the Company, or rights, options or warrants to acquire Capital Stock of the Company or other securities, to all or substantially all holders of the shares of Common Stock, excluding:</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:30.77%;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(v)<font style="margin-left:36pt;">dividends, distributions, rights, options or warrants for which an adjustment to the </font>Conversion Rate is required pursuant to Section 9(d)(i)(1) or Section 9(d)(i)(2);</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:30.77%;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(w)<font style="margin-left:36pt;">dividends or distributions paid exclusively in cash for which an adjustment to the Conversion Rate is required pursuant to Section 9(d)(i)(4);</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:30.77%;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(x)<font style="margin-left:36pt;">rights issued or othe</font>rwise distributed pursuant to a stockholder rights plan, except to the extent provided in Section 9(d)(v);</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:30.77%;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(y)<font style="margin-left:36pt;">Spin-Offs for which an adjustment to the Conversion Rate is required pursuant to Section 9(d)(i)(3)(b); and</font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">18</a></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:30.77%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:30.77%;text-indent:7.69%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(z)<font style="margin-left:36pt;">a distribution solely </font>pursuant to a shares of Fundamental Change, as to which Section 11 will apply,</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">then the Conversion Rate will be increased based on the following formula:</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><a name="_cp_text_6_37"></a><img src="ggvwl00lpuw3000003.jpg" title="" alt="" style="width:153px;height:43px;"></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">where:</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:23.08%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">CR</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">0</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the Conversion Rate in effect immediately before the Open of Business on the Ex-Dividend Date for such distribution;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:23.08%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">CR</font><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><sub style="font-size:85%; vertical-align:bottom">1</sub></font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the Conversion Rate in effect immediately after the Open of Business on such Ex-Dividend Date;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:23.08%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">SP</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the average of the Last Reported Sale Prices per share of Common Stock for the ten (10) consecutive Trading Days ending on, and including, the Trading Day immediately before such Ex-Dividend Date; and</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:23.08%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">FMV</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;"><font style="font-style:normal;">=the fair market value (as determined by the Board of Directors in good faith), as of such Ex-Dividend Date, of the shares of Capital Stock, evidences of indebtedness, assets, property, rights, options or warrants distributed per share of Common Stock pursuant to such distribution;</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:0%;font-style:italic;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">provided<font style="font-style:normal;">, </font>however<font style="font-style:normal;">, that if </font>FMV<font style="font-style:normal;"> is equal to or greater than </font>SP<font style="font-style:normal;">, then, in lieu of the foregoing adjustment to the Conversion Rate, the Holder will receive, for each $1,000 Principal of this Note held by the Holder on the record date for such distribution, at the same time and on the same terms as holders of shares of Common Stock, the amount and kind of shares of Capital Stock, evidences of indebtedness, assets, property, rights, options or warrants that the Holder would have received if the Holder had owned, on such record date, a number of shares of Common Stock equal to the Conversion Rate in effect on such record date.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Any increase made under the portion of this this Section 9(d)(i)(3) above &#8206;shall become effective immediately after the Open of Business on the Ex-&#8206;Dividend Date for such distribution. &#8206;To the extent such distribution is not so paid or made, the Conversion Rate will be readjusted to the Conversion Rate that would then be in effect had the adjustment been made on the basis of only the distribution, if any, actually made or paid.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">19</a></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:7.69%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><a name="_Ref417035412"></a><a name="_Ref367277489"></a><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(b)</font><font style="margin-left:36pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Spin-Offs</font><font style="color:#000000;"><a name="_Ref367277489"></a>.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Company distributes or dividends shares of Capital Stock of any class or series, or similar equity interest, of or relating to an Affiliate, a Subsidiary or other business unit of the Company to all or substantially all holders of the shares of Common Stock (other than solely pursuant to a Fundamental Change, as to which Section 11</font><font style="font-weight:bold;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">will apply), and such Capital Stock or equity interest is listed or quoted (or will be listed or quoted upon the consummation of the transaction) on a U.S. national securities exchange (a &#8220;</font><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Spin-Off</font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8221;), then the Conversion Rate will be increased based on the following formula:</font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:15.38%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><img src="ggvwl00lpuw3000004.jpg" title="" alt="" style="width:153px;height:43px;"></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:23.08%;text-indent:0%;font-size:12pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">where:</p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:23.08%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:12pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:15.38%;white-space:nowrap">
